subcategories.name: Newsletter
subcategories.description:
Sign up for the Stradivarius newsletter and stay ahead of the fashion game.
This is more than just a mailing list—it’s your backstage pass to everything Stradivarius. If you live for the latest trends, love experimenting with your style, and want to be the first to know what’s coming next, you’re in the right place. By subscribing, you’ll join a vibrant community of fashion lovers who see getting dressed as an act of self-expression. Expect curated emails full of inspiration: from new arrivals and seasonal must-haves to exclusive previews, styling tips, and special offers made just for you.
Why subscribe?
 Because every email is a moment of inspiration. Because you set trends, not follow them. And because you deserve to be the first to know about: Limited-edition collections and early access drops Exclusive discounts and subscriber-only perks Invitations to special events and collaborations Fresh styling ideas and outfit inspiration tailored to you We keep things visual, easy to explore, and full of energy—just like your lifestyle. Whether you’re dressing for everyday moments or special occasions, we’ve got looks to match your mood.
All you have to do?
Drop your email and get ready for a fashion-forward inbox that speaks your language. At Stradivarius, we believe fashion is more than clothes. It’s a vibe. A mindset. A way of showing the world who you are—without saying a word. ✨ Subscribe now and never miss out on what’s next in the world of Stradivarius.

subcategories.name: DENIM HUB
subcategories.description:
Denim is more than just a fabric; it's a statement. It's an attitude. It's the backbone of a modern, youthful wardrobe, and at Stradivarius, we celebrate its versatility. From classic jeans to innovative designs, our collection of denim clothes empowers you to express your unique style in countless ways. We believe that fashion is about feeling good and being confident, that's why we design clothes for every moment of your life.

The beauty of denim lies in its adaptability. A pair of wide leg jeans can be dressed up with a stylish top and heels for a night out, or dressed down with a casual tee and sneakers for a relaxed daytime look. The possibilities are endless, and at Stradivarius, we encourage you to experiment and find your own personal style.

For a touch of effortless cool, a denim jacket is an absolute must-have. It's the perfect layering piece for any season, adding a touch of edge to any outfit. Throw it over a dress for a bohemian vibe, or pair it with jeans for a classic double-denim look.

Looking for something a little different? Explore our range of denim skirts and denim dresses. A denim skirt is a fun and flirty option for warmer weather, while a denim dress offers a chic and effortless look that can be dressed up or down. 

At Stradivarius, we believe in offering a wide range of styles and fits to cater to every body type and personal preference. From skinny jeans to boyfriend jeans, from high-waisted to low-rise, we have the perfect pair of jeans to flatter your figure and make you feel confident. We also offer a variety of washes and finishes, from classic blue denim to trendy bleached and distressed styles.

But jeans are definitely not all we have to offer in terms of denim. Our denim dresses are perfect for any occasion, from casual days out to parties. You can also find stylish shirts, skirts, and even accessories made of denim at Stradivarius. We have everything you need to create a complete denim look that is all your own.

Denim shorts are a summer essential, offering a cool and casual alternative to jeans. Pair them with a flowy top and sandals for a beachy vibe, or dress them up with a blouse and heels for a night out. Denim shorts are a versatile piece that can be styled in countless ways.

Fashion is a way to express yourself, to show the world who you are. Don't be afraid to experiment with different styles, different washes, and different fits. Find your next favorite denim clothes and express yourself!

subcategories.name: Shirts
subcategories.description:
Denim shirts are a timeless staple in any wardrobe, offering a blend of casual coolness and versatile stleather-n2050?>jeans or denim skirts.

The denim shirt is more than just a piece of clothing; it's a statement. Whether you're going for a classic, edgy, or bohemian vibe, a denim shirt can help you achieve your desired look. Consider a white denim shirt for a fresh and clean look, or opt for a black denim shirt for a bolder statement.

Details matter, and our collection showcases a variety of design elements. From classic blue denim shirt washes to unique printed patterns, each shirt has its own distinct personality. The key is how you wear it, buttoned up, layered, or styled open over your favorite basics. Its versatility allows you to pair it with everything from relaxed fits to more polished outfits.

Consider trying a ladies' denim shirt in a darker wash for a sophisticated evening look. Pair it with tailored trousers and heels for a chic and unexpected ensemble. For a casual daytime look, layer a denim jacket over a dress or skirt, then add a black shirt to add a touch of mystery.

Don't be afraid to experiment with different silhouettes and washes. A light-wash denim shirt can brighten up any outfit, while a distressed denim shirt adds a touch of edginess. The possibilities are endless when it comes to styling this wardrobe essential. You can pair it with skirts for a more feminine ensemble or with trousers for a more urban look.

Each Stradivarius denim shirt is crafted with attention to detail and quality, ensuring both style and durability. We believe that fashion should be accessible and empowering, allowing you to express yourself confidently. Let your personality shine through with our curated selection!

Ready to elevate your wardrobe with a timeless piece? Explore our collection of female denim shirts and discover the perfect addition to your unique style. Express yourself, feel confident, and embrace the versatility of the denim shirt.

subcategories.name: Skirts
subcategories.description:
Denim skirts have evolved far beyond their casual roots to become an essential, go-to piece in every woman's wardrobe. With the perfect blend of laid-back comfort and chic style, they’re a staple that transitions effortlessly from day to night, season to season. At Stradivarius, we embrace the denim skirt’s versatility, offering styles that suit every mood, silhouette, and setting, from casual brunches to city nights out.

Our collection of women’s skirt denim is designed to meet every fashion preference and body type. At Stradivarius, we want every woman to feel confident, stylish, and completely herself. That’s why you’ll find a variety of shades and cuts in our STR Teen skirt range, everything from light, summery washes to deep indigo and classic black denim, each tailored to flatter and inspire.

For those who love a flirty, youthful vibe, our denim mini skirt options are ideal. They’re playful and perfect for warm days, just add a crop top and your favorite sneakers for an easy off-duty outfit. Need to take it up a notch? Style your mini with a silky blouse and heels, and you’re ready for anything from dinner dates to nights out with friends.

For a more elegant, elongated silhouette, our jean midi skirt brings a refined touch to the classic denim look. Whether you opt for a high-waisted cut or a front-slit detail, midi skirts pair beautifully with structured blouses, slim knits, or even a leather jacket when you’re after a bit of edge. It's the perfect piece for when you want something timeless, but never boring.

If you're after something more neutral or elevated, a black denim skirt makes a sharp, stylish statement. It's ideal for slightly dressier moments—simply add a blazer and heels and you’ve got a modern twist on business casual. For brighter, breezier days, the white denim skirt brings freshness and light to any outfit. Style it with flat sandals and a printed blouse for an easy summer vibe, or keep it crisp with monochrome pieces for minimalist appeal.

Our range of long denim skirts is perfect for creating outfits with effortless sophistication. Their soft structure and longer length make them ideal for transitional dressing, just tuck in a shirt or pair with a fitted knit for a polished, feminine silhouette. To make more of a style statement, opt for a denim maxi skirt with character: embroidery, patchwork details, frayed edges or a dramatic slit. These unique pieces let your personality shine through and add interest to your everyday wear.

Prefer something that blends style with function? Our skorts deliver the best of both worlds. Combining the feminine look of a skirt with the comfort and practicality of shorts, denim skorts are made for busy days and spontaneous adventures. Wear yours with a tucked-in graphic tee and chunky trainers for a sporty-casual vibe, or elevate it with a cropped jacket and ankle boots for an on-the-go outfit that still turns heads.

From fitted and flared to classic and cutting-edge, our jean denim skirts are designed with real women and real lives in mind. Explore the full Stradivarius collection to find the piece that fits your life, your body, and your personal style, because great denim never goes out of fashion.

subcategories.name: Jeans
subcategories.description:
Dive into the world of jeans at Stradivarius, where fashion meets comfort and individuality. We believe that expressing yourself through your clothing should be effortless and fun. That's why we offer a wide range of women's jeans designed to fit every style and occasion. From classic cuts to trendy designs, discover your perfect pair and embrace your unique vibe. Explore our selection and find the denim that speaks to you, allowing you to express your personality with confidence.

Our collection is designed to cater to all tastes and body types. Whether you're searching for a timeless staple or a statement piece, we've got you covered. From the eternally cool black jeans to the fresh and vibrant white jeans, our denim selection ensures you'll find the perfect fit and style to elevate your everyday wardrobe. Looking for something a little different? Explore our range of purple jeans for a pop of color! We offer a variety of washes, from light to dark, so you can find the ideal shade to complement your look.

Embrace the latest trends with our selection of fashion-forward denim. Discover the comfort and style of baggy jeans, perfect for creating a relaxed, urban look with a chic top. Or, channel a retro vibe with our flare jeansand a stylish blouse,which are making a big comeback. For those who love a classic fit, our mom jeans offer a flattering high waist and a comfortable, relaxed leg. We also offer low-rise jeans in our selection for a trendy, Y2K-inspired look, perfect to pair with chunky boots or heeled sandals.

The versatility of denim knows no bounds, and our collection reflects this with a variety of styles that can be dressed up or down to suit any occasion. From casual weekend looks to more polished outfits, there's a denim fit for every vibe. Think wide leg jeans for that effortlessly chic silhouette that moves with you, or go for bootcut jeans, a timeless style that pairs just as easily with chunky sneakers as it does with your favorite heels.

Complete your look with our coordinating pieces. Throw on a stylish jacket to add an extra layer of coolness, or keep it simple with a classic t-shirt. Our women's jeans collection is designed to be mixed and matched, allowing you to create endless outfit possibilities.

At Stradivarius, we believe that fashion should be accessible and empowering. Our jeans for women are designed to make you feel confident and stylish, no matter the occasion. Embrace your individuality and let your denim do the talking. We hope you enjoy our ladies' jeanscollection!

subcategories.name: Just in
subcategories.description:
Discover the fashion trends of the last week at Stradivarius.if there is one thing that characterises the autumn winter 2024 season, it is its eclecticism. The collections are focused on you and all your moods and the style is carried by flag, whatever the style. The 2024 fashion trends go beyond the clothes; it's not just new clothes, it's a new way of facing a changing and unexpected world that tells us that everything is yet to be explored. The latest trends are inspired by what's going on around you and adapt to your new rhythms of life. Check back here every week to find new trends, 2024 outfits inspiration for women and discover what version of yourself you want to be today. New Stradivarius collection. In this section you will find all the new clothes that have been added to the new Stradivarius collection in the last week. We warn you: with Stradivarius new season clothes you will have a crush. The most casual garments are perfectly combined with fabrics and accessories full of magic and charm in equal parts. The styles are fused away from any archetype or norm and invite you to dance as if no one was watching. Stradivarius dresses from our new collection are one of the most sought-after garments for winter outfits in 2024. It will be because they can be worn anytime, anywhere.

Key trends 2024-2025. No one and no trend has to tell you how to dress. Even so, we always like to put at the top those garments that we find interesting and innovative and that are the perfect candidates to accompany us all season long.2024 looks for women are different from other years because they can be easily adapted to your personal style, so don't be afraid if you wear the same garment to a birthday party or an event with your beasts. Baggy trousers, for example, give your outfit a twist by combining them with a crop top or sweatshirt. And if you still want to give it a cooler look, try one day with a pair of track boots and another day with a pair of trainers. And if there is one thing we can confirm as a fashion trend in 2024, it is the return of the mini skirt, which this season dares to go up a few more centimetres, or the puffer jacket above the hip. However, other garments have experimented with maximalism by opting for XXL silhouettes, such as dress trousers or joggers.

Trendy colours 2024. This autumn winter's on-trend colours will help you elevate your look or relax it depending on how you want to express yourself every day. This season vibrant colours stand out above the rest; on one side of the trend you'll find bold, metallic and even neon tones that will make even the most basic garment shine. At the other end of the spectrum, neutrals and the full range of browns will bring out your natural side.

However, other garments have experimented with maximalism by opting for XXL silhouettes, such as dress trousers or joggers.

Trendy colours 2025. This autumn winter's on-trend colours will help you elevate your look or relax it depending on how you want to express yourself every day. This season vibrant colours stand out above the rest; on one side of the trend you'll find bold, metallic and even neon tones that will make even the most basic garment shine. At the other end of the spectrum, neutrals and the full range of browns will bring out your natural side.

subcategories.name: Accessories
subcategories.description:
Looking to elevate your look? Fashion accessories are the perfect way to express your unique style and add a touch of personality to any outfit. From statement jewelry to chic bags, the right ones can transform a simple ensemble into something truly special. Discovering the latest trendy accessories in our collection is essential to stay ahead of the curve and showcase your individual flair!

Accessorizing is more than just adding finishing touches, it's about curating a collection of pieces that reflect your personal taste and enhance your overall aesthetic. Whether you're drawn to bold and vibrant designs or prefer minimalist and understated elegance, there's a perfect accessory waiting to be discovered.

Bags are a basic accessory, and at Stradivarius, you'll find a wide range of options to suit every need and occasion. From practical totes to stylish shoulder bags and backpacks, there's a bag for every mood. Explore the collection of bags. Whether you're heading to class, meeting friends for coffee, or going on a weekend adventure, the right bag can keep you organized and looking chic.

Jewelry is another fantastic way to express yourself through fashion accessories! Our fashion jewellery collection features everything from delicate necklaces and earrings to bold bracelets and rings. Find the perfect pieces to complement your outfit and add a touch of sparkle!

When it comes to adding definition to your silhouette, belts do double duty as both functional and fashionable accessories. Choose from classic leather belts, trendy chain styles, or statement buckles. A well-chosen belt can instantly elevate a simple dress or a pair of jeans.

Charms are also a fun and playful way to personalize your accessories. Whether you attach them to your bags, bracelets, or even clothing, they instantly create a unique and eye-catching look that stands out. With our diverse variety of charms, you can mix and match styles to express your individuality and add a personalized touch to every outfit.

Adding to your look, hair accessories have made a major comeback, bringing both whimsy and sophistication to any hairstyle. From elegant headbands and cozy scrunchies to chic clips and barrettes, these pieces let you elevate your style effortlessly. Perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions, hair accessories combine fashion with practicality, helping you achieve the perfect finishing touch to any look!

Express yourself with the ultimate fashionable accessories! Whether you're looking for something bold and eye-catching or subtle and understated, our collection offers endless possibilities to express your unique style. Embrace your individuality and explore the world of modern accessories to discover the perfect pieces that speak to you!

subcategories.name: Jeans fit guide
subcategories.description:
Denim is an eternal trend. Jeans are a wardrobe staple that never goes out of style. We are currently in the midst of the wide-leg jeans era, and we've found them in high-waisted versions, with pleats, in the boyfriend style, or in new shapes like the carpenter, baggy, or barrel jeans. 

Experts say that skinny jeans will make a comeback soon (or perhaps they never really left?) and although trends come and go, it's clear that denim always endures. If you want to know which jeans are going viral, you just need to follow us closely. At Stradivarius, we want to offer you a broad collection that includes the latest novelties as well as timeless classics that never fail. And all of this, in shades ranging from light blue to classic indigo, not to forget washes in white, black, and gray. In addition to sizes ranging from 34 to 44, our jeans also come in special lengths called petite and tall. The goal is crystal clear: no matter your style, there is a pair of jeans (at least) for you.

In our Jeans Fit Guide, you'll find all the new releases for each season regarding jeans, as well as style ideas to inspire you in your everyday life. Because the art of wearing jeans is not just about finding the perfect pair, it's also about mastering the stylistic keys to make the most of them. Want to know what the biggest denim trends are? Want to know which jeans are best to wear with sneakers or with heels? Want to know which jeans enhance your figure the most? Or which models are best suited for shorter individuals? Welcome, you're in the right place.

Don't miss out on the best Black Friday fashion deals! At Stradivarius, you'll find the latest trends in women's fashion that you'll love.

subcategories.name: D91
subcategories.description:
The Viral Stradivarius D91 Trousers
 Everyone Is Talking About If you've been on TikTok, Instagram, or anywhere fashion lives lately, you’ve probably heard of the Stradivarius D91 trousers. These viral pants have taken over social feeds for a reason: they’re the perfect blend of comfort, style, and that effortlessly cool vibe we all want in our wardrobes.

Their low wide leg cut brings a modern, relaxed silhouette that combines comfort and elegance in equal measure. More than just another pair of trousers, the D91s have turned into a style statement, capturing attention across social media and setting the trend in everyday fashion.

Stradivarius D91 low wide leg trousers: the trend everyone’s wearing
Designed to be both versatile and flattering, the Stradivarius D91 low wide leg trousers adapt easily to different styles and occasions. Their flowing shape balances perfectly with cropped jackets, fitted tops or oversized shirts, making them the ideal base for countless outfits. Whether you are aiming for a casual daytime look or a more polished evening style, the D91 trousers are the go-to choice for effortless dressing.

Stradivarius D91 trousers: timeless style with a modern twist

The Stradivarius D91 trousers stand out not only for their trend-setting design but also for their quality fabric and versatility. A staple piece for any wardrobe, they’re easy to wear all year round without compromising on style. From streetwear-inspired looks to more sophisticated combinations, the D91 trousers allow endless styling options without compromising on comfort. They are as practical as they are trendy, a rare balance that explains why they have become a best-seller.

The D91 trousers are available exclusively at Stradivarius stores and on the official website. Due to high demand, they often sell out fast, so keep an eye out for restocks!

Why are the Stradivarius D91 pants trending?
Because influencers and everyday users alike are praising their comfort, style, and how easily they adapt to any outfit.

How to style your D91 Stradivarius trousers?
Worn with trainers, they create an easy everyday outfit. Combined with heels, they deliver a sleek and elongated look. Paired with ankle boots, they offer the perfect mid-season vibe, making them suitable for any occasion.

subcategories.name: Trousers
subcategories.description:
Women's pants in every fit you can imagine. From the tightest leggings to the most comfortable wide-leg women's pants. At Stradivarius, you'll find all kinds of pants to feel good about your image every day of the week. 

Between us, there are days when comfort is paramount above all else, but that doesn't mean we want to sacrifice style. Our selection of elastic waistband pants for women come in both fitted silhouettes, like our stretch pants or women's leggings, and more relaxed versions, like our jogger pants or, one of the most elegant comfortable pants options, the culottes. Women's denim leggings, also known as jeggings, are presented as the most comfortable alternative to skinny jeans and work just as well with your denim looks. 

And if you want to be up-to-date, one of the star trends this season is undoubtedly corduroy pants which, moreover, are making a strong comeback in their flared version this year. Opt for this design and create comfortable and fashionable looks with zero effort. The long-awaited return of bell-bottom pants. Both lovers and haters of this trend finally agree on something: the flare pants are more versatile than ever this season. Truth be told, the flared pants are the garment of resistance as it remains, even if in the back of the wardrobe, waiting for a triumphant return every autumn-winter season. 

The most casual version of our collection is found in the flare leggings, which are presented in a range of printed women's pants, among which animal prints stand out. Elephant leg pants are the most faithful interpretation of this seventies silhouette, starting the leg width from mid-thigh. If you want to pay homage to the golden age of rock and psychedelia by introducing romantic elements, do not hesitate to combine a pair of bell-bottom jeans with a crochet crop top. The women's shorts that work best in autumn-winter. We know you love them, so don't give them up when temperatures drop. 

Our collection of women's shorts not only comes in warmer materials and fits more suitable for this time of year, but we also give you ideas to create your best looks this season. Starting with a classic from the most urban stylings with grunge and punk touches, the women's denim shorts over semi-opaque black tights and boots or sneakers is a winning styling for any day of the week. Just like the black shorts; in leather effect fabric, denim or suede, a black shorts look for winter allows as many combinations as you're willing to experiment with this garment. Combine it with tights or high boots and an oversized sweatshirt or sweater and set the trend. If you prefer to create a look with a more retro style, opt for our selection of women's bermuda shorts, slightly longer and in denim and twilled fabrics. 

Elevate your bermuda look this winter by adding a heel and a blazer, valid as an office look or as a semi-formal styling for any event where you want to give a trendy but professional appearance. Urban women's looks to conquer the city. Find your ripped pants of the season in our collection of women's jeans. Ripped jeans were a symbol of rebellion during the 70s, with the arrival of punk rock, but nowadays they stand as one of the most accepted trends by almost any style. All thanks to their different models, silhouettes, and degrees of fabric wear. Stradivarius's wide-leg jeans for women also form an interesting tribe within urban looks.

subcategories.name: Loose-fitting
subcategories.description:
Looking for comfort and style? Dive into the world of loose fitting trousers! These aren't your grandma's pants; they're a modern staple for any wardrobe. From effortless everyday looks to chic evening ensembles, our collection offers versatility and a relaxed vibe that's perfect for expressing your personal style!

Women’s loose fit trousers are the ultimate wardrobe chameleon. Dress them up with a sleek bodysuit and heels for a night out, or keep it casual with a simple t-shirt and sneakers for a day of exploring the city. The possibilities are endless!

The beauty of loose fitting trousers for women lies in their adaptability. They can seamlessly transition from day to night, from casual to dressy, depending on how you style them. Think of them as a blank canvas for your creativity. Pair them with a fitted top or bodysuit to balance the volume, or embrace the oversized trend with a flowy shirt. Add a blazer for a touch of sophistication, or a denim jacket for a more relaxed vibe.

Thinking about color? While we love a bold statement piece, you can never go wrong with classic black loose fitting trousers. They are a versatile base for countless outfits, easily paired with any top and accessories. They are a must-have in every wardrobe!

Fabric plays a crucial role in the overall look and feel of your loose fitting trousers. Lightweight materials like linen and cotton are perfect for warm weather, offering breathability and comfort. For cooler months, consider heavier fabrics like corduroy or wool blends.

Don't be afraid to experiment with different silhouettes. Wide-leg trousers create a dramatic and eye-catching look, while slightly tapered styles offer a more streamlined and flattering fit. Cropped trousers are perfect for showing off your favorite shoes, while full-length styles can be dressed up or down with ease. The key is to find a silhouette that complements your body type and personal style.

Styling your women's loose fitting trousers for different occasions is easy! For a casual daytime look, pair them with a simple t-shirt and sneakers. Add a denim jacket or cardigan for extra warmth. For a more dressed-up look, pair them with a silk blouse and heels. Add a blazer or statement jewelry to complete the look. For a night out, pair them with a sparkly top and strappy heels. Don't forget to add a clutch and some bold earrings!

Ready to express yourself and embrace the comfort and style of loose-fitting trousers? Our selection is waiting to become your new wardrobe staple. Find your perfect fit and let your style shine with ease and confidence!

subcategories.name: Dressy
subcategories.description:
At Stradivarius, we understand that women's office trousers are much more than just workwear. They are the foundation of a sophisticated, versatile, and stylish look that accompanies you throughout the day. Our collection of office trousers is designed for women like you, who are looking for the perfect garment to complete their style, whether it's for an important meeting, a busy day, or an evening out with friends after work.

We know that every woman has a unique style, that's why we offer a wide variety of designs, cuts and colours for you to find the office trousers that best suit your silhouette and personality. Do you prefer a classic and elegant style? Straight-leg or slightly flared women's dress trousers in neutral tones such as black, grey or navy blue are a safe bet. Try pairing your women's dress trousers with a white blouse, a blazer and heels. If you are looking for a more modern and sophisticated touch, go for white women's dress trousers, high-waisted palazzo trousers or a model with a checked print or pinstripes.

For a more relaxed yet equally chic look, flowy trousers are also an excellent choice. Pair them with a flowy blouse and heels for a flawless office look, or with a basic T-shirt and trainers for a casual and comfortable style. And if you're looking for trousers that allow you to move freely and comfortably throughout the day, don't miss our selection of shorts and long trousers.

At Stradivarius, we not only care about style, but also about your comfort. That's why our collection of office trousers is made with high-quality fabrics that are soft to the touch and breathable, so you can feel comfortable and confident throughout the day. In addition, many of our styles are available in petite-tall-regular sizes so you can find the perfect fit for your body. Don't miss our selection of trousers and create the wardrobe of your dreams.

subcategories.name: Cargo
subcategories.description:
Cargo pants are back and here to stay. This iconic garment from the 90s and early 2000s returns renewed and ready to conquer the streets. Their comfort, versatility, and unique style make them the perfect option for creating modern looks with tons of personality. At Stradivarius, you'll find a wide variety of women's cargo pants, from classic earth tones to bolder designs with unique details.

Cargo pants, known for their functional pockets and relaxed style, are a versatile option that adapts to any occasion. On the one hand, they can be combined with sneakers and a basic t-shirt for a casual and carefree look, while if you are looking for a more sophisticated style, opt for beige or black cargo pants and combine them with an elegant blouse and heels.

If you're looking for an office look, gray or brown cargo pants can be an excellent choice. Wear them with a white shirt and a blazer for a professional style with a modern twist. For a touch of personality, add accessories in vibrant tones or heels that provide subtle contrast.

On the other hand, if you like to experiment with fashion, women's cargo jeans are perfect for an urban look with a rebellious touch. A printed t-shirt and combat boots are the ideal combination to achieve an outfit with character and style.

And for festival days or outdoor events, they can also be the star garment. Wear long or short cargo pants with a top and comfortable sandals, and complete the look with eye-catching accessories or bright jewelry that add a distinctive and festive touch.

At Stradivarius, you'll find the perfect cargo pants for you. From classic options to more modern designs, we have everything you need to update your wardrobe with this versatile piece. Discover our selection of wide leg, skinny, flowy, or jogger cargo pants.

Explore the different options and find the pants that best suit your personal style. They are an excellent investment for any wardrobe, they are durable, comfortable and, most importantly, they are in fashion!

subcategories.name: Flare
subcategories.description:
Ready to make a statement? Flared trousers are back and bolder than ever! Embrace the retro vibe with this must-have silhouette that’s taking over the fashion scene. From casual days to nights out, the versatile women’s flared pants in our collection offer a stylish alternative to your everyday jeans or leggings.

Discover the perfect pair of women's flared trousers to elevate your wardrobe. Whether you're after a classic denim look or something more daring, we’ve got you covered. Get ready to turn heads and show off your unique flair with this iconic style.

Flared trousers are more than just a trend, they’re a statement. These trousers effortlessly blend comfort and style, making them a go-to choice for any fashion-forward individual. The flattering fit elongates your legs and accentuates your curves, creating a silhouette that’s both chic and empowering. Pair them with your favorite tops for an instant style upgrade!

Explore the endless possibilities of styling your ladies' flare pants. For a casual daytime look, team them with a simple t-shirt and trainers. Dress them up for a night out with a sleek top and heels, or a sophisticated blouse. Don't be afraid to experiment with different textures and colors to create a look that’s uniquely you!

Looking for something edgy? Opt for flared leather trousers to create a bold and confident look that stands out from the crowd. These statement pieces bring an instant touch of rock ‘n’ roll attitude to any outfit, effortlessly blending rebellious spirit with high fashion.

For a sophisticated and versatile option, consider black flared trousers. These wardrobe staples are perfect for creating a range of looks, from polished office-appropriate ensembles to chic weekend outfits. Their sleek silhouette adds an elegant touch, while the classic black hue ensures they’ll pair effortlessly with virtually anything in your closet, from crisp white shirts to casual tees. Whether styled with heels for a formal occasion or with flats for a relaxed day out, black flare pants offer timeless style and unmatched versatility that every wardrobe needs.

It's time to add some sass and style to your wardrobe with our flared trousers. Don't just follow trends, set them! Express yourself, feel amazing, and own every room you walk into. You deserve to feel confident and fabulous!

subcategories.description:
Culotte and palazzo pants have become an essential piece in the wardrobe of any woman looking for style and comfort. At Stradivarius, we offer you a wide range of these fashionable pants so you can create incredible looks for any occasion.

Palazzo pants, with their fluid drape and wide leg, are ideal for a sophisticated and comfortable look, perfect for both special events and your day-to-day. Its elegant design adds a touch of distinction without sacrificing comfort.

Imagine the feeling of freedom and style when wearing flowing white palazzo pants on a summer afternoon, where their delicate movement and elegant cut will make you feel like you are wearing a fresh breeze. And for a foolproof evening outfit, combine them with a lace top, a black blazer, and heeled sandals. If you prefer something more casual, choose patterned palazzo pants and pair them with a basic T-shirt and sneakers. Or try dress pants with a clutch and some eye-catching earrings!

Culotte pants, with their ankle-length cut, are perfect for a fresh and modern look. They are very versatile and adapt to any occasion. For an office look, you can combine them with a blouse and stilettos, while if you prefer a more casual style, combine white culottes with a striped T-shirt and flat sandals.

At Stradivarius you will find a wide variety of styles of women's culotte and palazzo pants. From classic navy blue palazzo pants to summery shorts, we have the perfect pants for you. You can also find them in different fabrics, such as cotton, linen or silk, so you can choose the one that best suits your style and the occasion.

Don't wait any longer and find the perfect women's culotte and palazzo pants for you at Stradivarius. You will love them!

subcategories.name: Leggings
subcategories.description:
Leggings have become an essential piece of clothing in every woman's wardrobe. Their versatility makes them perfect for any occasion, from going to the gym to going out for drinks with friends. At Stradivarius, we know you love fashion and comfort, so we offer a wide variety of women's leggings so you can find the perfect model for you.

You will find leggings in different fabrics, colors, and prints. For a sporty look, go for breathable sports leggings with a perfect fit that allows you to move freely. If you are looking for a more casual style, black leggings are a foolproof basic that you can combine with an oversized sweatshirt and sneakers. And for a more sophisticated look, go for leather-look leggings or those with lace details.

From classic black leggings to bolder options with prints and textures, there is always a perfect legging for every woman and moment. Dressy leggings for women are an ideal option for a casual look with a chic touch. Pair them with a nice blouse and ankle boots and you're ready for any occasion. If you want a more relaxed look, you can opt for short leggings and combine them with a basic T-shirt and sandals.

Sweatpants are the perfect complement for days when you don't want to wear leggings. You can opt for a monochrome look or play with different colors and prints for a more daring style. And if you're looking for an outfit to be comfortable at home, don't miss our collection of joggers, which are an ideal option to relax at home without sacrificing style. Combine them with a basic T-shirt and slippers and enjoy the comfort.

In our sportswear section, you will find everything you need to complete your workout looks. From leggings and sweatpants to sweatshirts and sneakers, we have a wide variety of clothing and accessories so you can find your perfect style.

At Stradivarius, we offer you a modern range of leggings so you can perform your best without sacrificing style. Find the perfect clothes for your workouts and look amazing while you exercise!

subcategories.name: Faux leather
subcategories.description:
Looking to add a touch of edgy sophistication to your wardrobe? Look no further than leather trousers. These versatile pieces are the ultimate statement, offering a sleek and stylish alternative to your everyday denim. Whether you're aiming for a rock-chic vibe or a polished, contemporary look, leather trousers are the perfect choice. Discover the endless possibilities of styling leather trousers for women and elevate your fashion game!

Leather trousers have evolved from a niche trend to a wardrobe staple, and for good reason. They offer a unique blend of comfort, durability, and undeniable style. Finding the perfect pair of leather trousers can transform your entire look. From classic black to bold burgundy, there's a shade to suit every personality and occasion.

One of the best things about leather trousers is their versatility. Dress them up with a silky top and heels for a night out, or keep it casual with a simple tee and trainers for a cool, everyday look. Don't be afraid to experiment with different textures and silhouettes to find what works best for you!

For a modern twist, consider wide leg leather trousers. This silhouette is both flattering and on-trend, offering a relaxed yet sophisticated vibe. Pair them with a fitted jacket to balance the proportions and create a chic, balanced outfit.

Black leather trousers are a perennial favorite, offering endless styling possibilities. They can be dressed up or down, making them a true wardrobe essential. For a softer, more feminine look, explore options like brown leather trousers. These warm, earthy tones are perfect for creating a cozy and stylish ensemble. And if you're feeling bold, why not try burgundyleather trousers for a pop of color?

Looking for a specific style? Flared leather trousers offer a retro-inspired look that's both fun and flattering. They're perfect for adding a touch of bohemian flair to your outfit. For a more streamlined silhouette, opt for straight legleather trousers, a classic choice that's always in style. Whatever your preference, there's a pair of leather trousers out there waiting to become your new favorite.

Complete your look with the perfect accessories. A stylish bag and a pair of leather shoes can elevate your outfit to the next level. Don't forget to experiment with different textures and colors to create a look that's uniquely you. A crisp shirt can also complement your leather trousers, creating a polished and sophisticated ensemble.

So, what are you waiting for? Embrace the confidence and style that comes with wearing leather trousers. Express yourself, experiment with different looks, and discover the endless possibilities of this iconic piece. It's time to make a statement and show the world your unique sense of style!

subcategories.name: STR Teen
subcategories.description:
At Stradivarius, we know that pants are the key garment to express your unique style. The trendy women's pants from the STR Teen collection offer you a wide variety of designs, from the trendiest to reinvented classics, so you can find the perfect pants for every occasion.

Whether you are looking for a casual look for day to day or a sophisticated outfit for a special occasion, our youthful pants collection has something for you. Designed to offer comfort and style, they are made with careful finishes and modern details that make the difference.

Trendy pants for women are an garment in any wardrobe. At Stradivarius, we understand the importance of having a selection that adapts to your pace of life and allows you to create incredible looks for any occasion.

Our collection includes a wide range of styles, from the most casual to the most sophisticated, so you can always find the perfect pants for you.

If you are looking for trendy pants for day to day, you will love our STR Teen jeans. Available in a variety of washes, cuts and styles, from classic skinny jeans to high-waisted or wide leg jeans, these jeans adapt to all silhouettes and allow you to create informal looks with a lot of style. Combine them with one of our STR Teen t-shirts with prints and sneakers for a casual look, or with a romantic STR Teen dress and heeled sandals for a more dressed-up outfit.

For special occasions, we suggest our dress pants. Among our palazzo pants, culottes or pleated pants, you will find the perfect design to dazzle at any event. You can pair them with a lingerie top and heeled sandals from our STR Teen footwear collection for an elegant and feminine look, or dare with a crop top from our STR Teen knitwear collection and sneakers for a more modern and groundbreaking outfit.

Looking for a comfortable and stylish look to wear at home or out for a walk? Our jogger pants and cargo pants are the perfect option. Made with soft fabrics and modern designs, they will provide you with the comfort you need without sacrificing style. Combine them with one of our oversized STR Teen jackets and sneakers for a comfy and fashionable look.

At Stradivarius, we care about offering you fashionable pants that adapt to your lifestyle. That's why you'll also find a wide variety of shorts and STR Teen skirts, ideal for warmer days. Denim shorts, dress shorts or sports shorts, choose the model that best suits you and create fresh looks full of personality.

Our trendy pants for women are the perfect option for girls looking for the ideal combination of style, comfort and quality. Discover our collection and find the ones that best suit you. We are waiting for you!

subcategories.name: White trousers
subcategories.description:
Embrace the timeless elegance of women’s white trousers. A staple in any wardrobe, they offer a fresh canvas for expressing your unique style. Whether you're aiming for a sophisticated summer look or a chic year-round ensemble, white trousers are the perfect foundation. Explore the possibilities and discover how ladies' white trousers can elevate your fashion game!!

One of the most appealing aspects of white trousers is their versatility. They effortlessly transition from casual daytime outings to elegant evening affairs. Pair them with a simple tee and sneakers for a relaxed weekend vibe, or dress them up with a silk blouse and heels for a night out.

For a summer look, consider white linen pants for women. Their lightweight and breathable fabric keeps you comfortable. These pants are perfect for beach days, festivals, or just strolling around town. Style them with sandals for a relaxed vibe or dress them up with wedges for a polished look.

White wide-leg pants are another fantastic option, offering a stylish silhouette. These pants can be dressed up or down with ease. Opt for white wide leg office trousers for a formal occasion, pairing them with a blazer and heels for a powerful look. For a casual take, team them with a crop top and boots.

If you're looking for something more edgy, consider white cargo trousers. These pants offer a utilitarian vibe with a touch of urban cool. Pair them with a graphic tee and sneakers for a streetwear look, or dress them up with a fitted top and heels for a unexpected twist.

For those with a smaller frame, finding the perfect fit is essential. Petite white pants are designed to flatter smaller figures, ensuring a comfortable and stylish fit. Look for styles that are tailored to your proportions, such as white high waisted pants, to create a flattering silhouette. A well-fitting pair of petite pants can boost your confidence.

Struggling to find the perfect white pants outfit? Don’t worry, the options are endless! A classic combination is pairing loose-fitting trousers with a Breton striped top for a nautical-inspired look. Another option is to style them with a denim jacket and sneakers for a casual vibe that works well for relaxed office settings. For a more polished approach, try tucking in a silk blouse and adding a pair of loafers or heeled sandals. Experiment with different colors and textures, and discover your style with white pants as your canvas!

Ready to refresh your wardrobe with the ultimate style statement? Explore our curated collection of white trousers and discover the perfect pair to express your unique personality. It's time to embrace the freshness, versatility, and confidence that comes with owning a flawless pair of white trousers.

seoCategory.name: Trousers
seoCategory.title: Women’s trousers | Stradivarius {0}
seoCategory.metaDescription: Discover our amazing collection of {1} at Stradivarius. Find the latest styles and fashion trends in dresses, pants, and more. Shop now and stand out with your unique style!
seoCategory.longDescription:
Women's pants in every fit you can imagine. From the tightest leggings to the most comfortable wide-leg women's pants. At Stradivarius, you'll find all kinds of pants to feel good about your image every day of the week. 

Between us, there are days when comfort is paramount above all else, but that doesn't mean we want to sacrifice style. Our selection of elastic waistband pants for women come in both fitted silhouettes, like our stretch pants or women's leggings, and more relaxed versions, like our jogger pants or, one of the most elegant comfortable pants options, the culottes. Women's denim leggings, also known as jeggings, are presented as the most comfortable alternative to skinny jeans and work just as well with your denim looks. 

And if you want to be up-to-date, one of the star trends this season is undoubtedly corduroy pants which, moreover, are making a strong comeback in their flared version this year. Opt for this design and create comfortable and fashionable looks with zero effort. The long-awaited return of bell-bottom pants. Both lovers and haters of this trend finally agree on something: the flare pants are more versatile than ever this season. Truth be told, the flared pants are the garment of resistance as it remains, even if in the back of the wardrobe, waiting for a triumphant return every autumn-winter season. 

The most casual version of our collection is found in the flare leggings, which are presented in a range of printed women's pants, among which animal prints stand out. Elephant leg pants are the most faithful interpretation of this seventies silhouette, starting the leg width from mid-thigh. If you want to pay homage to the golden age of rock and psychedelia by introducing romantic elements, do not hesitate to combine a pair of bell-bottom jeans with a crochet crop top. The women's shorts that work best in autumn-winter. We know you love them, so don't give them up when temperatures drop. 

Our collection of women's shorts not only comes in warmer materials and fits more suitable for this time of year, but we also give you ideas to create your best looks this season. Starting with a classic from the most urban stylings with grunge and punk touches, the women's denim shorts over semi-opaque black tights and boots or sneakers is a winning styling for any day of the week. Just like the black shorts; in leather effect fabric, denim or suede, a black shorts look for winter allows as many combinations as you're willing to experiment with this garment. Combine it with tights or high boots and an oversized sweatshirt or sweater and set the trend. If you prefer to create a look with a more retro style, opt for our selection of women's bermuda shorts, slightly longer and in denim and twilled fabrics. 

Elevate your bermuda look this winter by adding a heel and a blazer, valid as an office look or as a semi-formal styling for any event where you want to give a trendy but professional appearance. Urban women's looks to conquer the city. Find your ripped pants of the season in our collection of women's jeans. Ripped jeans were a symbol of rebellion during the 70s, with the arrival of punk rock, but nowadays they stand as one of the most accepted trends by almost any style. All thanks to their different models, silhouettes, and degrees of fabric wear. Stradivarius's wide-leg jeans for women also form an interesting tribe within urban looks.

subcategories.name: Jeans
subcategories.description:
Denim is an eternal trend. Jeans are a wardrobe staple that never goes out of style. We are currently in the midst of the wide-leg jeans era, and we've found them in high-waisted versions, with pleats, in the boyfriend style, or in new shapes like the carpenter, baggy, or barrel jeans. 

Experts say that skinny jeans will make a comeback soon (or perhaps they never really left?) and although trends come and go, it's clear that denim always endures. If you want to know which jeans are going viral, you just need to follow us closely. At Stradivarius, we want to offer you a broad collection that includes the latest novelties as well as timeless classics that never fail. And all of this, in shades ranging from light blue to classic indigo, not to forget washes in white, black, and gray. In addition to sizes ranging from 34 to 44, our jeans also come in special lengths called petite and tall. The goal is crystal clear: no matter your style, there is a pair of jeans (at least) for you.

In our Jeans Fit Guide, you'll find all the new releases for each season regarding jeans, as well as style ideas to inspire you in your everyday life. Because the art of wearing jeans is not just about finding the ideal pair, it's also about mastering the stylistic keys to make the most of them. Want to know what the biggest denim trends are? Want to know which jeans are best to wear with sneakers or with heels? Want to know which jeans enhance your figure the most? Or which models are best suited for shorter individuals? Welcome, you're in the right place.

Don't miss out on the best Black Friday fashion deals! At Stradivarius, you'll find the latest trends in women's fashion that you'll love.

subcategories.name: D92
subcategories.description:
D92 jeans have become an essential piece in the wardrobe of any fashion lover. Their name, which may seem like a secret code, actually hides the key to a casual, modern style full of personality. D92 jeans, with their characteristic cut, represent the fusion of classic and modern, adapting to any occasion and elevating your looks to another level.

But what are D92 jeans really and why have they generated so much expectation? This name refers to a specific design pattern from Stradivarius that is characterized by its high waist, straight and slightly wide leg, and a wash that gives it an irresistible vintage look. Far from being simple straight jeans, D92 jeans are synonymous with attitude, a style that does not follow the rules and seeks comfort without sacrificing sophistication.

This cut, inspired by the aesthetics of the 90s, is back and here to stay. Its high waist stylizes the figure, while the straight leg in a wide leg style brings a casual and modern air. The wash, generally in blue or black tones, gives them a vintage look that makes them even more irresistible.

When talking about D92 jeans, as with D98 jeans, it is essential to mention their versatility. You can combine them with a tight top and sneakers for a casual and urban look, or elevate the level with a flowy blouse and heeled sandals for a special occasion. And if you're looking for a groundbreaking touch, go for low-waist jeans, which add a carefree and nostalgic air inspired by 2000s fashion.

Add a personal touch to your D92 jeans with accessories that reflect your style. A striking belt can make a difference and define your silhouette, while an original handbag or special jewelry can completely transform your look. For an even more impactful effect, go for designer sunglasses or a structured jacket to give the finishing touch to your outfit.

If you don't already have a pair of Stradivarius D92 jeans in your wardrobe, what are you waiting for? Don't limit yourself to just one style, explore the different options that Stradivarius offers and create unique looks with your D92 jeans. The possibilities are endless!

subcategories.name: Low-rise
subcategories.description:
Low-rise jeans are back to stay. This iconic garment from the '90s and 2000s has made a strong comeback, becoming an essential element in the wardrobe of fashion lovers. At Stradivarius, you'll find a wide selection of low-rise jeans for women, from classic blue jeans to bolder, more modern styles, with details like rips, distressing, or patches.

Women's low-rise jeans are incredibly versatile and adapt to any style. You can pair them with a crop top or a basic t-shirt for a casual and carefree look, while if you're looking for a more sophisticated outfit, opt for an elegant blouse or a fitted bodysuit. Complete your look with sneakers, heeled sandals or boots, the possibilities are endless!

At Stradivarius, we know that comfort is as important as style. That's why we offer a wide range of jean styles in different fabrics, from classic D92 jeans to low-rise denim jeans. You'll also find a wide variety of sizes in petite and tall jeans, so you can find the low-rise jeans for you.

If you're looking for a more relaxed and comfortable style, wide-leg, low-rise jeans are an excellent option. These jeans will give you a casual and modern air, ideal for everyday wear. For a casual-chic look, complete the outfit with a printed t-shirt and sneakers, or go for a fitted top and sandals.

For a more sophisticated look, choose low-rise jeans in a dark shade, such as black or indigo blue. Wide-leg jeans in these shades stylize the silhouette and provide an elegant air without sacrificing comfort. Pair them with an elegant blouse and heels for a outfit for a night out or a special occasion. Dare to add a touch of color? White low-rise jeans are a fresh and bright option for spring and summer. Their versatility allows you to create relaxed looks as well as more sophisticated combinations. Pair them with a vibrant colored top and sandals for a cheerful and lively look, or go for neutral tones and gold accessories for a more elegant and refined style. Our collection of STR Teen jeans in light shades are an excellent choice to achieve this effect, providing a youthful and modern air. Also, if you want to visually lengthen your legs and stylize your silhouette, low-rise flare jeans are also an ideal option.

Discover the Stradivarius collection of women's low-rise jeans and find the style for you. Don't miss out on your favorite jeans!

subcategories.name: D91
subcategories.description:
The Viral Stradivarius D91 Trousers
 Everyone Is Talking About If you've been on TikTok, Instagram, or anywhere fashion lives lately, you’ve probably heard of the Stradivarius D91 trousers. These viral pants have taken over social feeds for a reason: they’re the perfect blend of comfort, style, and that effortlessly cool vibe we all want in our wardrobes.

Their low wide leg cut brings a modern, relaxed silhouette that combines comfort and elegance in equal measure. More than just another pair of trousers, the D91s have turned into a style statement, capturing attention across social media and setting the trend in everyday fashion.

Stradivarius D91 low wide leg trousers: the trend everyone’s wearing
Designed to be both versatile and flattering, the Stradivarius D91 low wide leg trousers adapt easily to different styles and occasions. Their flowing shape balances perfectly with cropped jackets, fitted tops or oversized shirts, making them the ideal base for countless outfits. Whether you are aiming for a casual daytime look or a more polished evening style, the D91 trousers are the go-to choice for effortless dressing.

Stradivarius D91 trousers: timeless style with a modern twist

The Stradivarius D91 trousers stand out not only for their trend-setting design but also for their quality fabric and versatility. A staple piece for any wardrobe, they’re easy to wear all year round without compromising on style. From streetwear-inspired looks to more sophisticated combinations, the D91 trousers allow endless styling options without compromising on comfort. They are as practical as they are trendy, a rare balance that explains why they have become a best-seller.

The D91 trousers are available exclusively at Stradivarius stores and on the official website. Due to high demand, they often sell out fast, so keep an eye out for restocks!

Why are the Stradivarius D91 pants trending?
Because influencers and everyday users alike are praising their comfort, style, and how easily they adapt to any outfit.

How to style your D91 Stradivarius trousers?
Worn with trainers, they create an easy everyday outfit. Combined with heels, they deliver a sleek and elongated look. Paired with ankle boots, they offer the perfect mid-season vibe, making them suitable for any occasion.

subcategories.name: Skinny fit
subcategories.description:
Looking for the perfect pair of jeans that hug your curves and offer a stylish, contemporary look? Then skinny jeans are your go-to! These versatile bottoms are a wardrobe staple, easily dressed up or down for any occasion. They're a classic for a reason, and with endless washes and styles, you're sure to find your perfect fit. Discover our range of skinny jeans for women and elevate your everyday style!

The classic skinny jeans for women have evolved from a trend to a timeless essential. Their sleek silhouette effortlessly complements various body types, creating a streamlined and flattering figure. Whether you're pairing them with fitted and loose t-shirts for a casual day out or dressing them up with heels and a blazer for a night on the town, skinny jeans offer endless styling possibilities.

One of the best things about skinny jeans is their versatility. They come in a range of washes, from classic indigo to edgy black, and even fun, unexpected colors. This means you can find a pair to suit any mood or occasion. Experiment with different washes to create unique looks that reflect your personal style!

For a touch of rebellious flair, consider ripped skinny jeans. These edgy jeans add a cool, deconstructed vibe to any outfit. Pair them with a band tee and a denim jacket for a rock-inspired look, or dress them up with a silk camisole and ankle boots for a night out. Ripped skinny jeans are a great way to show off your personality and add a bit of attitude to your wardrobe.

The beauty of skinny jeans lies in their ability to be styled in countless ways. For a casual daytime look, pair them with oversized sweaters and sneakers. Add some necklaces for a touch of sparkle and you're ready to go! On the other hand, if you are looking for a more polished look, try tucking a blouse into your skinny jeans and adding a belt. Finish the look with heels or boots for a chic and sophisticated ensemble.

When it comes to finding the best skinny jeans, fit is key. Look for a pair that hugs your curves without feeling too tight or restrictive. The fabric should be comfortable and allow for movement. Consider the rise of the jeans as well, for example, a high-waisted pair can create a flattering silhouette and elongate your legs. Don't be afraid to try on different styles and sizes to find the perfect fit for your body type!

Skinny jeans are not just about fashion, they're about feeling confident and comfortable in your own skin. They're a blank canvas that allows you to express your personal style and create looks that make you feel amazing. So go ahead, explore our collection and find the perfect pair to elevate your wardrobe. Let your style shine!

subcategories.name: Wide-leg
subcategories.description:
Wide leg jeans are back in a big way, offering a stylish and comfortable alternative to skinnier fits. At Stradivarius, we embrace this trend with a diverse collection designed to flatter every figure and suit any occasion. Discover the perfect pair to elevate your wardrobe and express your unique style.

The resurgence of the wide leg jeans for women marks a shift towards relaxed yet fashionable silhouettes. These jeans offer a refreshing change from the more restrictive styles that have dominated the fashion scene for years. The beauty of wide leg jeans lies in their versatility; they can be dressed up with heels and a blazer for a sophisticated look, or dressed down with sneakers and a crop top for a casual, everyday vibe.

Stradivarius understands the importance of offering options, and our range reflects this commitment to variety and inclusivity. Explore our collection and find high waisted wide leg jeans in an array of washes, from classic indigo to edgy black and trendy pastel hues. We cater to all preferences, ensuring that every woman can find her perfect fit. Whether you're looking for a statement piece or a reliable staple, our wide leg jeans for women are designed to become a go-to item in your wardrobe.

The key to styling wide leg jeans is balancing the proportions. Pair them with fitted sweaters to accentuate your waist and create a flattering hourglass shape. Accessorize with wide belts to further define your silhouette and add a touch of personality to your outfit. Don't forget to check out our selection of earrings to complete your look!

Styling wide leg jeans is all about creating balance and showcasing your personal style. For a chic and effortless look, pair your jeans with a tucked-in blouse and some platform sandals. This combination elongates your legs and adds a touch of sophistication to your outfit. For a more casual vibe, team your wide leg jeans with a graphic tee and sneakers. This is a perfect option for running errands or grabbing coffee with friends. Add a denim jacket for extra warmth and style. Don't be afraid to experiment with different tops and accessories to find what works best for you.

The versatility of wide leg jeans makes them a blank canvas for your creativity. If you're petite, don't shy away from wide leg jeans! The key is to find the right length and rise to flatter your figure. Opt for petite wide leg cropped jeans that are tailored to your height. Pair them with heels or platforms to add extra length to your legs. Depending on your proportions, high rise wide leg jeans can help elongate the torso, while mid rise wide leg jeans offer a universally flattering fit. For a more laid-back look, low rise wide leg jeans bring a relaxed, early 2000s vibe that’s trending again.

Explore our collection at Stradivarius and discover the perfect fit to elevate your wardrobe.

subcategories.name: Mom fit
subcategories.description:
Looking for that perfect blend of comfort and style? Look no further than mom jeans! These aren't your actual mom's jeans (unless your mom is super stylish, of course!). Think vintage vibes with a modern twist, perfect for creating a relaxed yet chic look. Find your perfect fit!

Mom jeansfor women are all about embracing a relaxed silhouette. They typically feature a high waist, a relaxed fit through the hips and thighs, and a slightly tapered leg. This cut is flattering on a variety of body types, creating a balanced shape. The beauty of high-waistedmom fit jeans lies in their versatility.

One of the reasons why mom jeanshave become so popular is their comfort. Unlike super-skinny jeans that can feel restrictive, they offer a more relaxed and comfortable fit. This makes them ideal for everyday wear, whether you're grabbing coffee with friends, or just lounging at home. The looser fit also allows for greater freedom of movement, so you can stay comfortable all day. 

Styling mom jeans is a breeze thanks to their timeless cut and effortless vibe. For a casual daytime look, pair ripped mom jeans with sneakers and a tucked-in t-shirt to highlight your waist. Add a blouse and some heels with black mom jeans if you want to dress them up for a night out. Don't be afraid to experiment with different tops and accessories.

Accessorizing your mom jeans is a great way to elevate your look. For example, adding a simple belt not only cinches your waist but also brings a polished touch to the outfit. Complementing this with a necklace or bold earrings introduces personality and flair, while a stylish bags ties everything together for a chic appearance. The possibilities for creating unique looks are truly endless!

For those with a smaller frame, we also offer petite mom jeans, specially tailored to fit and flatter without overwhelming your silhouette. These jeans maintain the signature relaxed fit and high rise of classic mom jeans but are adjusted in length and proportions to suit petite figures perfectly. Whether you’re looking for a casual everyday pair or something to dress up, petite mom jeans provide all the comfort and style.

Looking for something a little different? Why not try short mom jeans for the warmer months? They offer the same comfortable and flattering fit as the full-length version, but with a summery twist. You can pair dark mom jean shorts with a crop top and sandals for a cool and casual look.

So, are you ready to find the best mom jeans for you? With their comfortable fit, flattering silhouette, and endless styling possibilities, they're a must-have in any fashion-forward wardrobe. Let your confidence shine and rock them with pride!

subcategories.name: Straight
subcategories.description:
Explore the versatility of straight leg jeans. Whether you prefer a classic blue wash, a sleek black denim, or a trendy colored style, our collection has something for everyone. Dress them up with a pair of loafers and a silk blouse for a sophisticated look, or dress them down with a fitted t-shirts and sneakers for a casual vibe. The possibilities are endless. Consider pairing your new jeans with one of our cropped blazers for an updated classic look. And don't forget to accessorize with one of our stylish handbags to complete your outfit.

Discover the latest trends in straight jeans for women. From distressed details to raw hems and unique washes, our collection is constantly updated with fresh styles to keep you ahead of the curve. Experiment with different lengths and rises to find the most flattering fit for your body type. Whether you're petite, tall, or somewhere in between, we have a pair of jeans that will make you feel confident and stylish. On cooler days, layer your jeans with one of our cozy cardigans. The soft knitwear will add a touch of warmth and texture to your ensemble.

Find your perfect fit with our range of high waisted straight leg jeans. This flattering style cinches at the waist, creating a streamlined silhouette and accentuating your curves. Pair them with a tucked-in top and heels for a chic and polished look, or dress them down with a graphic tee and sneakers for a more casual vibe. For those who prefer a lower rise, we also offer low rise straight leg jeans that sit comfortably on the hips.

Explore the comfort and style of high rise straight leg jeans. This popular style offers a modern take on a classic silhouette, providing a comfortable and flattering fit that sits high on the waist. Pair them with a tucked-in blouse or a cropped sweater to accentuate your waistline and create a balanced look. For a more relaxed and effortless style, consider our mid rise straight leg jeans, which offer a versatile and comfortable fit that sits just below the natural waist.

Discover the perfect pair of jeans for your body type with our collection of women's straight leg jeans. We offer a variety of sizes and fits to ensure that every woman can find a pair that makes her feel confident and stylish. Whether you're looking for a classic denim wash, a trendy colored style, or a distressed pair with edgy details!

The beauty of women’s straight leg jeans lies in their adaptability. They can be dressed up or down to suit any occasion. The key is to experiment with different styling options and find what works best for you. With the right accessories and a little creativity, you can create a multitude of stylish looks with just one pair of straight jeans. Don't be afraid to step outside your comfort zone and try something new. Fashion is all about self-expression, so have fun and let your personality shine through.

subcategories.name: Flare
subcategories.description:
Ready to groove into a retro vibe? The woman’s flared jeans are back and bigger than ever! These iconic denim trousers are perfect to add a touch of vintage-inspired style to your wardrobe. Forget skinny jeans for a moment and embrace the freedom and fun of this style!

Flared jeans, also known as bell bottom jeans, are characterized by their fitted waist and thighs, gradually widening from the knee down to create a distinctive bell shape. This silhouette is incredibly flattering, balancing proportions and adding a touch of drama to any outfit.

Whether you're a seasoned fashionista or just starting to explore your personal style, bell pants or jeans offer endless possibilities. From casual daytime looks to glamorous evening ensembles, these versatile pants can be dressed up or down to suit any occasion. Explore the world of flare pants and discover your perfect fit.

The beauty of this style of jeans lies in their versatility. You can find them in a variety of washes, from classic indigo to trendy colored denim. Consider black flare jeans for a sleek and sophisticated look, or explore different shades of blue for a more casual vibe. For a vintage-inspired outfit, opt for light-wash flared jeans with a slightly distressed finish. If you're feeling bold, try white or cream flared jeans for a modern twist, perfect for spring and summer.

There's a perfect pair of jeans out there for every body type. High-waist flared jeans are ideal for elongating the legs and cinching the waist, creating a flattering hourglass figure. On the other hand, low-rise flared jeans offer a laid-back, vintage-inspired look that sits comfortably on the hips and adds an effortless vibe to your outfit. They're perfect for styling with cropped tops or tucked-in t-shirts, bringing back early 2000s energy. Whether you prefer a defined waist or a more relaxed fit, flared jeans are a stylish choice that suits a variety of silhouettes.

Thinking about how to style your jeans with bell bottoms? The options are endless! For a casual daytime look, pair them with a simple t-shirt and trainers. Want to elevate the outfit? Swap the sneakers for heeled sandals and add a fitted blouse or a cropped blazer for an effortlessly chic vibe. For a boho-inspired style, try combining dark flare jeans with a flowy printed top and ankle boots. And if you're heading out in the evening, go for a sleek bodysuit and statement accessories to add a touch of elegance to the look.

So, what are you waiting for? It's time to ditch the ordinary and embrace the extraordinary. Find your perfect pair of ladies' flared jeans and get ready to turn heads wherever you go! express yourself, feel confident, and let your style shine!

subcategories.name: Petite & Tall
subcategories.description:
Finding the perfect pair of jeans can be a challenge, especially when standard sizes just don't quite cut it. That's where petite and tall jeans come in! At Stradivarius, we believe everyone deserves to feel confident and comfortable in their denim, no matter their height. We offer a wide range of styles designed to flatter everyone, ensuring you find your forever fit. Let's explore the world of perfectly proportioned denim!

For our petite customers, we've carefully adjusted the inseam, rise, and pocket placement of our jeans to create a balanced and flattering silhouette. No more bunching at the ankles or feeling overwhelmed by excess fabric! Our petite jeans are designed to elongate your legs and enhance your natural curves.

And for our taller customers, we offer jeans with longer inseams and a comfortable rise that won't leave you feeling exposed. Say goodbye to jeans that are too short! Our tall jeans provide the length you need to rock your favorite styles with confidence.

We know that style is just as important as fit. That's why our petite and tall jeans collections include all the latest trends, from classic skinny jeans and timeless straight legs to trendy wide-leg styles and comfortable mom jeans. You'll find a variety of washes, from light and summery to dark and sophisticated, as well as details like distressed accents, raw h cems, and unique pocket designs.

Pair your petite or tall jeans with basic t-shirts for a timeless and effortless look. A tucked-in tee adds structure and highlights the fit of your denim, while oversized styles give a more laid-back vibe. And when it gets cooler, sweaters are a perfect match. Petite styles work well with cropped knits, while tall silhouettes shine with longer, relaxed fits that add comfort without compromising style.

Blazers and jackets are also great layering options, you can choose a fitted blazer to elevate your look or a loose, oversized jacket for extra edge. They add polish and dimension to any denim outfit, making them perfect for both casual and dressed-up occasions.

Complete your outfit with sneakers for a casual, street-ready touch. Whether classic white or bold colors, they add energy to your denim look and keep things practical. Add a backpack for functionality and flair. It’s the ideal finishing touch, great for everyday errands or a city day out, and it keeps your outfit looking cool and coordinated.

Whether you're petite or tall, finding the right jeans can transform your entire wardrobe. A well-fitting pair of jeans can be dressed up or down, making them a versatile staple for any occasion. Pair your favorite petite tall jeans with a basic t-shirt or a stylish sweater for a casual everyday look. Dress them up with a blazer and heels for a night out. The possibilities are endless!

Don't settle for jeans that don't fit! Discover the difference that perfectly proportioned denim can make. Explore our petite and tall jeans collections today and find your dream pair. You deserve to feel amazing in your clothes, and we're here to help you achieve that!

subcategories.name: STR Teen
subcategories.description:
Dive into the world of urban jeans for women, where comfort meets edgy style. These aren't just your average jeans, they're a statement. Perfect for expressing your individuality and rocking the latest trends, the style of street wear jeans are a must-have in every modern wardrobe. Whether you're hitting the city streets or chilling with friends, there is a perfect pair to elevate your look.

Discover the ultimate collection of STR Teen urban jeans at Stradivarius! We've curated a range that embodies the spirit of youth, freedom, and self-expression. From distressed finishes to wide-leg silhouettes and bold details, each pair is designed to turn heads and elevate your everyday look. Forget boring denim, it’s time to embrace styles that reflect your unique vibe and make every outfit feel effortlessly cool.

Explore the versatility of urban denim jeans. These pieces are designed to be mixed and matched, allowing you to create endless outfits. You can pair them with a cool top and some statement accessoires for a night out, or dress them down with sneakers and a hoodie for a casual day look. The possibilities are limitless!

Looking for that perfect fit? We've got you covered. From figure-hugging skinny jeans to relaxed boyfriend styles, our range of urban jeans for women comes in a variety of cuts and washes. Experiment with different silhouettes to find the ones that flatter your figure and make you feel confident.

One option is the classic low-waist jean, which brings a bold, retro vibe inspired by the early 2000s. Perfect for casual, laid-back looks, they pair effortlessly with cropped tops, oversized shirts, or cropped jackets, giving your outfit a confident and edgy touch.

On the other hand, barrel jeans focus on comfort while keeping a trendy edge. Their wide, slightly flared silhouette adds a fresh twist to classic denim. This style is ideal for creating relaxed yet stylish outfits, especially when balanced with more fitted tops.

Meanwhile, our iconic D92 jeans stand out with their straight cut and clean finish, offering a sleek and minimalist take on urban denim. This style works great as a versatile foundation, easily dressed up with blazers and structured shirts or down with sneakers and simple tees for everyday wear.

Our street wear jeans include everything from classic blues to bold colors and edgy prints. Distressed details, unique washes, and unexpected embellishments add a touch of personality to each pair. Don't be afraid to step outside your comfort zone and try something new!

We're constantly updating our collection with the latest trends and must-have styles. So, whether you're searching for the perfect pair of urban jeans or just looking for some style inspiration, be sure to check back often. There's always something new and exciting to discover at Stradivarius!

Ready to unleash your inner fashionista? Let your urban jeans do the talking! These jeans are more than just clothing, they're a canvas for your creativity and a reflection of your unique style. Go ahead, find your perfect pair and show the world who you are!
