seoCategory.name: Dresses
seoCategory.title: Women’s dresses | Stradivarius {0}
seoCategory.metaDescription: FREE STORE SHIPPING | Discover our incredible collection of {1} on Stradivarius. Find the latest styles and fashion trends in dresses, pants and much more.
seoCategory.longDescription:
It is clear that in our imagination and our desire we can fit more dresses than in our wardrobe. But don't worry, because you'll find them all here. Tight mini dresses, flowy floral dresses, shirt dresses, knitted, romantic, midi length, with ruffles, sophisticated dresses for a date, hippie dresses for sunsets on the beach, elegant dresses to go to the office or appropriate for a wedding. 

HOW DO YOU FIND THE PERFECT DRESS?
 Few garments in the collective fashion imagination are as romantic, as feminine and as fashionable as a dress. On the catwalk, in the movies or in social networks and fashion magazines we have seen the birth of such iconic dresses that continue to float in our memory even though seasons go by and trends change. But how do we find the ideal dress for our everyday life? If you are often tormented by the famous "what should I wear" or you want to know how to get the most out of this wonderful women's fashion garment, keep reading because we are going to try to give you the keys to find the dress that best suits you according to your body type, how to adapt it to each occasion and, of course, how to adapt it to your style.

THE DRESS THAT SUITS YOU BEST.
 It's time to put an end to some myths, such as that long dresses don't suit short people. The secret lies in making the right choice. If you are 1.60 metres tall, you don't have to resign yourself to wearing only mini dresses: a long dress with a slit in the skirt or simply a long dress, perhaps asymmetrical with a belt, will help to slim and elongate your figure. Other fashion tips you should know are that if you want to conceal your bust, wrap dresses or dresses with a V-neck or even halter neckline will help you to tuck it in, but if you want to enhance your breasts, opt for strapless, balconette or asymmetrical necklines. Would you like to lift your curves? Stretch, gathered, pleated and ribbed dresses are for you. If you prefer to make them more subtle, choose flared options, straight and plunging shapes or draped proposals.

DAY AND EVENING DRESSES.
 Historically, dress codes have established that for evening events we should wear long dresses, while for daytime events (cocktail type) short dresses are the winning option. And our advice is to measure the formality of the event you are attending to adjust your styling to the protocol. If you want to stick to it, choose a long, flowing and elegant dress for the evening; and a short dress, above the knees and in bright colours if your date is during the day. But since the real fun of fashion is adapting it to your style, don't hesitate to choose a sophisticated LBD (Little black dress) with asymmetric details, ruffles or similar details for an evening event or choose a shirt dress or a long knitted dress for daytime if the occasion allows it.

subcategories.name: Skirts
subcategories.description:
Your ideal skirt for any occasion 
Skirts for all styles 
At Stradivarius, you'll discover a wide variety of skirts to suit every taste and occasion. From midi and long skirts perfect for a cosmopolitan look, to short skirts in every imaginable style, including pleated skirts for a preppy look or boho skirts with ruffles and pareo. 

Skirts for your everyday 
For everyday wear, Stradivarius offers you a plethora of options, from denim or corduroy skirts with an urban touch, to super romantic skirts. If you're seeking a more formal look, consider a pleated skirt or a skirt-pants. 

Skirts for the most special nights 
For those special occasions, Stradivarius presents a selection of party skirts to suit every preference. Choose between more festive designs or sober and sophisticated models. For an elegant look, pair a tube or pencil skirt with a lace or chiffon blouse, high-heeled sandals, and maxi earrings. 

Skirts with great texture 
The fabric of a skirt defines its style. At Stradivarius, you'll find structured designs like corduroy or faux leather skirts, as well as fluid proposals like midi models in tulle, chiffon, and satin. 

Plain and patterned skirts 
To create an exceptional outfit, a strong base is essential. At Stradivarius, discover a range of white and black skirts in different lengths, ideal for complementing any ensemble. For those seeking a bolder style, explore our selection of plaid skirts, animal prints, or floral patterns to make a statement. 

Choose your Stradivarius skirt With so many options to choose from, you're bound to discover the perfect skirt at Stradivarius. 
Visit our website or stop by your nearest store to explore the extensive collection of skirts we have just for you.

subcategories.name: Midi and maxi
subcategories.description:
At Stradivarius, our selection of women's skirts caters to every style and occasion. From flowy maxi skirts to playful mini skirts, we've got you covered. But if you're looking for the perfect balance between chic and comfortable, a skirt that effortlessly transitions from day to night, then the midi skirt is your wardrobe must-have.

Midi skirts, often reaching just below the knee or elegantly grazing the ankles, offer a universally flattering silhouette for every body type. They beautifully accentuate the natural curves of the body, creating a balanced and graceful look. This makes them an incredibly versatile piece, perfect for women of all ages and styles.

The midi skirt, with its flattering length that typically falls below the knee and above the ankle, is a versatile piece that can be dressed up or down with ease. Whether you're heading to the office, a brunch date, or a night out with friends, there's a midi skirt out there for you.

For a casual and effortless look, try a denim midi skirt. Pair it with a simple t-shirt and sneakers for a relaxed vibe, or dress it up with a blouse and sandals for a more polished ensemble.

Denim midi skirts offer endless styling possibilities. For a casual-chic look, pair your skirt with a tucked-in graphic tee and white sneakers. For a more elevated feel, opt for a sleek bodysuit, a blazer, and heels. Denim midi skirts are perfect for creating a stylish and effortless look for everyday wear.

If you're looking for something a little more elegant, opt for a mini skirt in a flowy fabric like satin or chiffon. A black midi skirt is a timeless choice that can be dressed up with heels and a statement top for a special occasion.

And don't forget to check out our selection of STR Teen skirt for even more stylish options. Whether you prefer a long denim skirt or a pleated midi skirt, we've got you covered.

Our STR Teen collection offers trendy and youthful designs that cater to a younger audience. Whether you're looking for a statement piece or something more understated, our selection has something to suit every teen's unique sense of style.

For a sportier look, a skort is a great option. And if you're looking for something truly unique, try a leather midi skirt or a sequin midi skirt.

At Stradivarius, we celebrate individuality and encourage you to embrace your unique fashion sense. Our collection of midi skirts empowers you to experiment with different looks and express yourself through your clothing.

subcategories.name: Denim
subcategories.description:
Denim skirts seamlessly blend practicality with fashion-forward aesthetics, making them a go-to choice for creating effortlessly cool outfits. A denim mini skirt adds a touch of youthful energy to your style, while a long denim skirt brings a more relaxed and bohemian feel. This is the perfect way to update your wardrobe!

For a classic and versatile option, consider a blue jean skirt. Its neutral tone makes it easy to pair with a variety of tops and accessories. Looking for something a little different? A black denim skirt offers a sleek and edgy alternative, perfect for creating a more sophisticated or rebellious look. There are also ladies' denim skirts for all styles!

The beauty of denim skirts lies in their adaptability. Dress them up with stylish tops and heels for a night out, or keep it casual with a comfortable t-shirt and sneakers for a day of exploring the city. Layer with a knit sweater or shirts for added warmth and style during cooler months. Don't forget to complete your outfit with one of our amazing jackets!

A denim midi skirt offers a sophisticated and on-trend silhouette, while a denim maxi skirt exudes a relaxed and bohemian vibe. Experiment with different washes, lengths, and styles to discover the women's denim skirts that best complement your aesthetic. Don't forget about the white denim skirt if you are looking for a fresh and clean summer style!

Midi and maxi denim skirts are great options for those looking for a more modest and stylish look. A denim midi skirt can be paired with a tucked-in blouse and heels for a chic and sophisticated outfit, while a denim maxi skirt can be dressed down with a t-shirt and sandals for a relaxed bohemian vibe. White denim skirts are a great summer option, offering a fresh and clean look that's perfect for warm weather. Explore the different lengths and styles to find the perfect denim skirt for your body type and personal style.

From the classic denim mini skirt to the contemporary denim maxi skirt, the possibilities are endless. subcategories.name: Mini
subcategories.description:
The miniskirt: a timeless icon of style and confidence. At Stradivarius, we celebrate the versatility of the mini skirt, offering a diverse selection to take you from day to night, casual outings to special occasions. Discover the perfect skirt to express your unique personality and embrace the power of this wardrobe .

The miniskirt first rose to prominence in the 1960s as a symbol of youth and rebellion, quickly becoming a staple in women's wardrobes worldwide. Its enduring appeal lies in its ability to effortlessly blend style and comfort, allowing for endless outfit possibilities.

From the classic black mini skirt to playful denim designs, our collection caters to every taste and trend. Looking for a sophisticated edge? Explore our mini skirts, perfect for a night out or adding a touch of rebellion to your everyday look. Embrace a touch of sparkle with a sequin mini skirt, guaranteed to turn heads. For a more relaxed vibe, our denim mini skirts offer endless possibilities, easily dressed up or down.

Each style tells a different story, reflecting your individual personality and approach to fashion. Whether you're drawn to classic silhouettes or contemporary designs, our diverse range ensures there's a miniskirt to match your unique sense of style.

A white mini skirt embodies summery chic, while a brown mini skirt adds a touch of warmth to your wardrobe. Explore different fabrics and textures, like a pleated mini skirt for a playful touch or a sleek and stylish denim skirt for a casual yet put-together look. We believe that the perfect denim skirt can be dressed up or down, making it a versatile piece for any wardrobe.

From flowy silhouettes perfect for warmer days to structured designs ideal for evening wear, the options are endless. Don't be afraid to experiment with different lengths, cuts, and details to find the perfect miniskirt to flatter your figure and express your personal style.

Our STR Teen skirt collection offers a range of mini skirts designed with the latest trends in mind, while our skort options provide comfort and style in one. Whether you prefer a classic A-line, a bodycon fit, or a flowing silhouette, our skirt collection has something for everyone.

We believe that fashion should be accessible to all, which is why our collection caters to a diverse range of styles and budgets. Whether you're searching for a statement piece for a special occasion or a versatile staple to add to your everyday wardrobe, you'll find it at Stradivarius.

Embrace the versatility of women's mini skirts and discover a world of styling possibilities. Pair a denim skirt with a graphic tee and sneakers for a casual daytime look, or dress it up with a blouse and heels for an evening out. A black mini skirt is a timeless choice that can be paired with anything from a band tee to a silk cami. For a pop of color, explore our selection of brightly colored mini skirts and embrace the joy of expressing your unique style.

Accessorize with belts, jewelry, and hats to create unique looks that reflect your mood and the occasion. Let your creativity run wild and embrace the versatility of this iconic garment.

At Stradivarius, we believe that fashion is a form of self-expression. Our STR Teen skirt collection is designed for those who dare to be bold and embrace their individuality. Whether you're searching for the perfect black mini skirt, a statement leather mini skirt, or a playful denim mini skirt, our collection has something for every style and personality. Don't be afraid to experiment with different styles, colors, and textures to find the perfect mini skirt to make you feel confident and ready to take on the world.

subcategories.name: Skorts
subcategories.description:
The skort has made a major comeback and it's not hard to see why. With the graceful flow of a skirt and the freedom of shorts, this hybrid piece brings together the best of both worlds. A go-to for everything from brunch dates to spontaneous adventures, skorts combine practicality with polish. And they’re no longer just a summer favorite, today’s skorts are designed for year-round styling with fabrics and cuts that move with you.

At Stradivarius, our collection of women’s skorts covers every mood and moment. Want something simple and sweet for running errands or meeting friends? Or something elevated for a night out? We've got you. These are the kind of pieces that offer both comfort and confidence, with a little bit of playfulness mixed in.

Mini skorts are loved for their fun, flirty feel, especially when the weather gets warmer. They look amazing with a cropped tee, oversized sunglasses, and sneakers. Heading to a beach town? Toss on a breezy button-down and sandals. Prefer something longer? A midi skirt inspired skort adds grace and movement, perfect with espadrilles or ankle boots depending on your mood.

Feeling bold? Leather skorts are your ticket to a cool, confident look. Structured like a mini skirt but with more edge, they pair beautifully with floaty blouses or fitted tops. Add strappy heels and layered jewelry, and you’re ready for a night out. The smooth texture of leather balances soft silhouettes, making it a fashion-forward choice that never fails to impress.

Linen skorts are made for sun-soaked days. Lightweight, breathable, and irresistibly easy-going, they’re the definition of relaxed style. Pair yours with a crisp white tee or tank top, some statement sunglasses, and sandals. Whether you’re exploring a new city or enjoying a picnic in the park, you’ll stay cool and chic all day long.

Denim skorts are a year-round . Think of them as your favorite jeans in disguise, feminine and practical in equal measure. Styled with graphic tees, sneakers, or boots, they bring youthful charm to any outfit. Our range includes different washes and details, so you can dress them up with a blouse and heeled ankle boots or keep it casual with a hoodie and high-tops. It’s a denim dream with a twist.

Black and white women’s skorts are style chameleons. A black skort is your go-to for sleek, versatile outfits, it transitions from day to night in a snap, especially when styled with a bold top or statement accessories. White skorts feel fresh and modern, ideal for summer styling. Pair them with colorful tops, woven bags, or crisp blazers for a polished look with a laid-back edge.

Our STR Teen skirt collection offers playful pieces designed for young trendsetters. From classic denim to vibrant prints, these skorts are perfect for mixing comfort with cool. Great for school days, weekend hangouts, or holiday outings, they're made to move, explore, and express personal style without skipping a beat.

At Stradivarius, we’re all about pieces that make you feel great while looking effortlessly stylish. That’s why our skorts are crafted from high-quality materials that offer the perfect blend of comfort, shape, and versatility. Whether you’re into soft linen, edgy leather, or classic denim, there’s a skort in our collection that will instantly become your new favorite. Explore the latest styles and rediscover just how fun getting dressed can be!

subcategories.name: STR Teen
subcategories.description:
Step up your style game with our collection of urban skirts! Designed for the modern teen, these skirts are the perfect blend of comfort and trendsetting style. Whether you're hitting the streets with your crew or heading to class, our trendy skirts will keep you looking effortlessly cool. Explore the latest trends and find your perfect fit.

Our collection of STR Teen skirts is designed to reflect the energy and creativity of urban fashion. We believe that expressing your personality through your clothes should be fun and accessible. That’s why we offer a range of styles, from classic cuts to bold, innovative designs. So, get ready to turn heads and make a statement with our amazing collection of fashion skirts!

Discover the versatility of our trendy skirts, perfect for mixing and matching with your favorite tops and accessories. From casual day looks to edgy night-out outfits, these skirts are a wardrobe for every fashion-forward teen. Embrace your individuality and create unique styles that reflect who you are.

Our urban skirts collection offers something for everyone. Think high-waisted denim skirts paired with basic t-shirts for a relaxed vibe, or a sleek mini skirt with a statement blouse for a night out. Don't forget to check out our selection of basic t-shirts to complete your casual looks. Accessorize with bags to carry all your in style.

Explore the latest trends in skirt lengths and silhouettes. Experiment with different textures and fabrics. Our fashion skirts come in various materials, from soft cotton to edgy faux leather, ensuring you find the perfect piece for any occasion. Layer with denim jackets for a cool, effortless look.

Consider pairing your new urban skirt with platform sandals for an added boost of style and comfort, or choose blouses for a sophisticated touch. Whether you prefer a classic A-line skirt or a daring urban mini skirt, we've got you covered. Each piece is designed with attention to detail, ensuring both style and quality.

Ready to reinvent your wardrobe? Our urban skirts are not just clothing; they're a canvas for your self-expression. Don't be afraid to experiment with colors, patterns, and styles that speak to you. Whether you're into bold prints or minimalist designs, our collection empowers you to create looks that are uniquely you.

Our trendy skirts are made to move with you, whether you're dancing at a concert or exploring a new city. Comfort and style go hand in hand, so we prioritize high-quality fabrics and flattering fits. Feel confident and empowered in our skirts, knowing that you're rocking the latest trends with ease. From the perfect urban mini skirt for summer days to versatile midi skirts that transition seamlessly from day to night, our collection is always evolving to bring you the freshest styles. Stay ahead of the curve and discover new ways to wear your favorite skirts. Let your creativity shine, and express yourself through fashion!

Set trends, don’t follow them. Our stylish skirts are made to express your unique style and boost your confidence. Explore bold looks, unleash your creativity, and own your fashion journey. Find the urban skirts that speak to you, let’s elevate your wardrobe!

seoCategory.longDescription:
Your ideal skirt for any occasion 
Skirts for all styles 
At Stradivarius, you'll discover a wide variety of skirts to suit every taste and occasion. From midi and long skirts perfect for a cosmopolitan look, to short skirts in every imaginable style, including pleated skirts for a preppy look or boho skirts with ruffles and pareo. 

Skirts for your everyday 
For everyday wear, Stradivarius offers you a plethora of options, from denim or corduroy skirts with an urban touch, to super romantic skirts. If you're seeking a more formal look, consider a pleated skirt or a skirt-pants. 

Skirts for the most special nights 
For those special occasions, Stradivarius presents a selection of party skirts to suit every preference. Choose between more festive designs or sober and sophisticated models. For an elegant look, pair a tube or pencil skirt with a lace or chiffon blouse, high-heeled sandals, and maxi earrings. 

Skirts with great texture 
The fabric of a skirt defines its style. At Stradivarius, you'll find structured designs like corduroy or faux leather skirts, as well as fluid proposals like midi models in tulle, chiffon, and satin. 

Plain and patterned skirts 
To create an exceptional outfit, a strong base is essential. At Stradivarius, discover a range of white and black skirts in different lengths, ideal for complementing any ensemble. For those seeking a bolder style, explore our selection of plaid skirts, animal prints, or floral patterns to make a statement. 

Choose your Stradivarius skirt With so many options to choose from, you're bound to discover the perfect skirt at Stradivarius. 
Visit our website or stop by your nearest store to explore the extensive collection of skirts we have just for you.

subcategories.name: Jorts
subcategories.description: Jeans jorts have become an item in today's fashion, blending the comfort of shorts with the classic style of denim. This trend, popular in the fashion world, stands out for its versatility, allowing the creation of both casual and elegant outfits. Jeans jorts are ideal for any season, offering a fresh and modern option for warm days and a perfect base for layered looks during cooler weather. With a variety of styles, from classic straight cuts to more daring versions with frayed details and embroidery, jeans jorts cater to all tastes and preferences. The available colors range from traditional blues and blacks to bolder shades like white and gray, allowing for a wide range of combinations. The inclusion of elastic fabrics in jeans jorts ensures greater comfort and freedom of movement, making them perfect for everyday wear. Additionally, the length of jeans jorts varies, from shorter styles to models that reach just above the knee, offering options for different styles and occasions. Whether for a casual outing, a day at the beach, or even a more formal event, jeans jorts are a stylish and practical choice. Their ability to pair with a wide range of garments, from basic t-shirts to elegant blouses, makes them an item in any wardrobe. Jeans jorts are the perfect option for those seeking a modern and versatile look without sacrificing comfort.

subcategories.name: Bermuda shorts
subcategories.description:
Bermuda shorts are back in a big way, offering a stylish and comfortable alternative to traditional shorts and trousers. At Stradivarius, we embrace this trend with a collection that caters to every style, from casual denim to sophisticated tailored options. Discover how to incorporate these versatile pieces into your wardrobe and create effortlessly chic looks. 

Explore our range of bermuda shorts and find the perfect pair to complement your personal style. We understand the importance of offering diverse options, ensuring you find exactly what you're looking for. Within our selection of shorts, we invite you to also explore our denim shorts, a timeless staple that can be dressed up or down for any occasion. For those seeking a blend of skirt and shorts, our collection of skorts offers a fashionable and functional choice. However, if you need something appropriate for a more professional environment, check out our office shorts, designed to keep you cool and stylish at work. And for a trendy, elongated silhouette, don't miss our bermuda jorts, a modern take on the classic denim look.

The rise of bermuda: a fashion staple

Bermuda shorts have evolved from casual vacation wear to a sophisticated fashion statement. Their longer length offers a more polished look than traditional shorts, while still providing the comfort and breathability needed for warmer weather.

Styling your bermuda shorts: endless possibilities

The beauty of ladies bermuda shorts lies in their versatility. They can be dressed up or down, making them suitable for a variety of occasions. For a casual daytime look, pair your denim bermuda shorts with a simple t-shirt and sneakers, and elevate it with a tucked-in blouse and sandals for a more polished feel. For evening events, opt for tailored bermuda shorts in a sophisticated fabric like linen or silk, paired with a fitted top and heels. 

Denim bermuda shorts: a timeless classic

No wardrobe is complete without a pair of denim bermuda shorts. This classic style is endlessly versatile and can be dressed up or down to suit any occasion. Pair them with a crop top and sneakers for a casual weekend look, or dress them up with a blouse and heels for a night out.

Tailored bermuda shorts: sophistication and style

Tailored bermuda shorts bring an elevated touch to any outfit, combining structure and style in one effortless piece. Crafted from refined materials like twill, cotton, or linen, they offer a flattering silhouette that works for both day and night. Whether styled with a relaxed tee and flat sandals or paired with a sharp blazer for a put-together ensemble, these shorts are a wardrobe staple for a modern, polished look.

Our collection of bermuda shorts is designed to help you express your unique style with confidence. Whether you prefer classic denim, tailored linen, or trendy prints, we have the perfect pair of bermuda shorts to suit your taste. Explore our collection at Stradivarius today and discover the endless possibilities of this timeless trend.

Within our selection of shorts, we invite you to also explore our denim shorts, a timeless staple that can be dressed up or down for any occasion. For those seeking a blend of skirt and shorts, our collection of skorts offers a fashionable and functional choice. However, if you need something appropriate for a more professional environment, check out our office shorts, designed to keep you cool and stylish at work. And for a trendy, elongated silhouette, don't miss our bermuda jorts, a modern take on the classic denim look.

The rise of bermuda: a fashion staple

Bermuda shorts have evolved from casual vacation wear to a sophisticated fashion statement. Their longer length offers a more polished look than traditional shorts, while still providing the comfort and breathability needed for warmer weather.

Styling your bermuda shorts: endless possibilities

The beauty of ladies bermuda shorts lies in their versatility. They can be dressed up or down, making them suitable for a variety of occasions. For a casual daytime look, pair your denim bermuda shorts with a simple t-shirt and sneakers, and elevate it with a tucked-in blouse and sandals for a more polished feel. For evening events, opt for tailored bermuda shorts in a sophisticated fabric like linen or silk, paired with a fitted top and heels. 

Denim bermuda shorts: a timeless classic

No wardrobe is complete without a pair of denim bermuda shorts. This classic style is endlessly versatile and can be dressed up or down to suit any occasion. Pair them with a crop top and sneakers for a casual weekend look, or dress them up with a blouse and heels for a night out.

Tailored bermuda shorts: sophistication and style

Tailored bermuda shorts bring an elevated touch to any outfit, combining structure and style in one effortless piece. Crafted from refined materials like twill, cotton, or linen, they offer a flattering silhouette that works for both day and night. Whether styled with a relaxed tee and flat sandals or paired with a sharp blazer for a put-together ensemble, these shorts are a wardrobe staple for a modern, polished look.

Our collection of bermuda shorts is designed to help you express your unique style with confidence. Whether you prefer classic denim, tailored linen, or trendy prints, we have the perfect pair of bermuda shorts to suit your taste. Explore our collection at Stradivarius today and discover the endless possibilities of this timeless trend.

Our collection offers a diverse range of women's shorts to satisfy all tastes and styles. From the most basic and timeless models to the latest trends, you'll be able to find the perfect pair to complete your summer outfits.

If you are looking for a comfortable and casual look, our denim shorts are ideal to combine with a basic t-shirt and sneakers. Perfect for everyday wear, these types of jeans provide a relaxed and youthful air. For a more sophisticated look, you can opt for shorts in flowing fabrics such as linen or satin, which can be easily combined with an elegant top and heeled sandals. This type of outfit is ideal for outdoor dinners, informal events or a summer evening where you want to feel fresh and stylish.

Looking for a comfortable and fashionable look to go to the beach or pool? Then don't miss our women's denim shorts with a distressed touch, which are ideal to combine with a bikini and flat sandals for a trendy summer look.

In addition to the classic denim tones, you can also explore our selection of colored denim shorts, ideal for adding a vibrant or delicate touch to your look. Pink shorts, for example, are perfect for those looking for a sweet, feminine and summery style, while yellow shorts bring a fresh and sunny air, ideal to stand out during the summer days.

If you identify with a more urban look, cargo shorts are a functional and fashionable option, as they provide a utilitarian touch and look great with oversized t-shirts or fitted tops. And if you prefer a more daring style, women's mini shorts are perfect to stand out. Fitted and modern, they are ideal for evening looks or to wear with boots or platforms.

Our collection of women's shorts is designed to offer you maximum comfort and style during the hottest days of the year. Explore our wide selection and find the perfect pair for you!

subcategories.name: Dressy
subcategories.description:
Step into the modern workplace with confidence and style. At Stradivarius, we present a curated collection of tailored shorts designed to blend professionalism with contemporary fashion. Whether you're aiming for a smart-casual look or a polished ensemble, our range offers versatile options to suit any office environment. Explore our selection and discover how to incorporate shorts into your work wardrobe seamlessly.

Tailored shorts for ladies are no longer a trend but a wardrobe staple. We offer a diverse array of designs, from tailored high-waisted shorts to comfortable bermuda shorts, ensuring there's a perfect fit for every woman. Our collection focuses on combining comfort, style, and professionalism, allowing you to feel confident and empowered throughout your workday. Consider pairing your shorts with items from our suits collection for a coordinated and professional look.

Fabric and Fit: the key to professional shorts

Choosing the right fabric and fit is crucial when selecting women’s tailored shorts. Opt for materials like linen, cotton blends, or tailored fabrics that offer breathability and structure. Avoid excessively tight or revealing styles to maintain a professional appearance.

Styling tips for tailored shorts

Mastering the art of styling tailored shorts can elevate your work attire. Pair high-waisted shorts with a tucked-in blouse or a fitted blazer for a sophisticated look. Add a waistcoat to define your figure and accessorize with delicate jewelry for a touch of elegance. .

Color palette and patterns: choosing the right options

The color palette of your smart shorts can significantly impact your overall look. Neutral tones like black, navy, gray, and beige are timeless choices that exude professionalism.

Accessorizing your office shorts

The right accessories can transform your office shorts outfit from simple to sophisticated. Pay attention to the details and choose accessories that enhance your overall style while maintaining a professional demeanor.

Transitioning tailored shorts from day to night

One of the advantages of office shorts is their versatility. With a few simple adjustments, you can easily transition your outfit from day to night. Swap your office-appropriate blouse for a stylish top or camisole. Embrace the versatility of office shorts and create stylish looks for any occasion.

Explore our Stradivarius collection today and discover the perfect pair of office shorts to elevate your work wardrobe. With our commitment to quality and style, Stradivarius can confidently embrace shorts as a fashionable and professional choice.

subcategories.name: Skorts
subcategories.description: Skorts, a clever blend of skirts and shorts, are a versatile and stylish addition to any wardrobe. Combining the feminine appeal of a skirt with the practical comfort of shorts, skorts have become increasingly popular for their functionality and fashionable look. They are particularly favored in activewear and casual wear, offering the freedom to move without compromising on style. Skorts come in various designs, catering to different preferences and occasions. Some feature a front panel that mimics a skirt with hidden shorts underneath, while others have an even blend of both elements, providing a seamless look from all angles. The materials used in skorts range from lightweight and breathable fabrics for athletic purposes to more structured and stylish fabrics for casual or dressy occasions. One of the main advantages of skorts is their practicality. They provide the coverage and confidence of shorts, making them ideal for activities such as hiking, biking, or playing sports. At the same time, they offer the chic appearance of a skirt, suitable for outings, casual gatherings, or even semi-formal events. The versatility of skorts is further enhanced by the variety of styles available. From sporty and casual designs with elastic waistbands and moisture-wicking materials to more sophisticated options with pleats, buttons, and zippers, there is a skort for every taste and need. Additionally, skorts can be easily paired with a range of tops, from casual t-shirts and tank tops to more elegant blouses and jackets, making them a versatile piece for any season. Skorts are also a practical choice for travel, providing comfort and style in one easy-to-pack garment. In conclusion, skorts are a fashionable and functional alternative to traditional skirts and shorts. Their blend of style and practicality makes them a must-have item for any wardrobe, offering endless possibilities for both casual and active wear. Whether for sports, leisure, or a stylish day out, skorts provide the perfect balance of comfort and elegance.

subcategories.name: Jackets
subcategories.description:
From jackets to blazer-style coats, Stradivarius women's jackets come in as many versions as you do. Because you don't wake up every day with the same mood, your jacket shouldn't be the same either. Yes, we know. 

One of the garments that constantly makes its way in and out of your wardrobe is the biker jacket; a piece that self-proclaims itself as the favorite transitional jacket year after year for both girls and boys. Logical, few garments are as versatile as this one, accepting everything from loose and urban silhouettes, like the oversized denim jacket, to more fitted and cropped styles. That's why this season we haven't forgotten to include the warmest version of this must-have in our collection: the shearling-lined denim jacket. With its soft and furry interior, no cold weather can resist it.

 A denim jacket, regardless of the style, will never let you down. That's a fact. Just like women's knit jackets, which can serve as an extra layer for those days when the chill catches you off guard or as a cool pseudo-sweater, subtly revealing a lace bralette (then don't say we didn't give you ideas ;). On the sportier side, the women's anorak is the best friend of those who feel the chill the most. Mind you, just because it's sporty doesn't mean you can only wear it to the gym. Stradivarius' women's anoraks and jackets are so beautiful and versatile that you can create HI-LO looks with more sophisticated pieces. 

Our collection is full of styling ideas for you to get inspired. Go ahead and take a look. Feathers, padding, or shearling? Not everyone feels the cold the same way, which is why our collection of women's winter jackets is as extensive as the degrees a thermometer can drop. Okay, maybe we don't have jackets for a trip to the North Pole, we won't deceive you. But speaking of traveling, did you know that a lightweight down jacket is the best? It's comfortable, equally warm, takes up very little space, and doesn't feel heavy at all. If you're someone who likes to move freely without being bothered by clothes, you'll love the women's down vest above all else. The romance continues with a design that exudes folk vibes through the sleeves, collar, and zipper, but above all, through its interior. We're talking about the women's shearling jacket, a style that transcends trends and adapts to them without succumbing. 

This is the case of the aviator or shearling jacket, with a leather exterior and shearling interior, paying homage to the vintage pilot jacket. We're sure that if you rummage through your parents' closets, you'll find one from the '80s, but just in case they weren't cautious and got rid of it without consulting you, here you'll find that aviator jacket and many more women's coats for this fall-winter. Transitional and winter jackets for everyday wear. 

We need our wardrobe to make life easier, not complicate it, right? That's why it's always better to have a versatile and stylish collection of women's jackets on hand that looks good with any outfit, even when dressing in the dark.

subcategories.name: Parka
subcategories.description:
Women's trench coats and parkas are essential garments in any wardrobe, capable of elevating your style while protecting you from the elements. At Stradivarius, you will find a wide selection of trench coats and parkas designed to adapt to your lifestyle, from classic and timeless models to more modern and daring options. These versatile jackets allow you to express your personal style without sacrificing comfort or protection against the elements.

The women's trench coat is an iconic garment that has transcended the barriers of time and has become an essential basic. Its versatility allows you to combine it with a wide range of garments, from jeans and basic t-shirts for a relaxed urban look, to dress pants and blazers for a more sophisticated style.

In our collection we offer a wide variety of trench coats, from the classic beige to models in other colors such as black, navy blue or green. You will also find short women's trench coats, long trench coats and even waterproof trench coats so you can face any weather situation in style.

Women's parkas have become a favorite of many thanks to their casual style and great versatility. They are the perfect garment for the coldest days, as they are usually made with warm and water-resistant fabrics, and they are also very practical for everyday use thanks to their design with a hood and pockets.

Also, within our STR Teen jackets you can also find ideal options to complete your looks with a more youthful and modern air. Our denim jackets, for example, are a timeless basic that goes with everything from dresses to cargo pants, perfect for a casual style with a 90s touch. On the other hand, our faux suede jackets provide a soft and elegant finish, ideal for elevating any outfit without losing comfort. These options further expand the possibilities for creating unique styles, adapted to your pace of life and each season.

Whether you are looking for an elegant black women's trench coat to complete your most sophisticated looks or if you prefer a comfortable and stylish parka for day to day, at Stradivarius you will find the perfect garment for you. Discover our collection and choose the one that best suits your style!

subcategories.name: Faux suede
subcategories.description:
Suede-effect jackets have become an essential garment in women's wardrobes, adding a touch of style and versatility to any look. These garments stand out for their soft and slightly velvety texture, which imitates real suede, offering an elegant yet relaxed style. They are also perfect for any season, since their lightweight and adaptable design allows them to be combined with both winter and mid-season clothing, creating sophisticated looks without sacrificing comfort.

At Stradivarius, we understand the importance of having options that adapt to different styles and occasions, so our collection of suede-effect jackets for women offers a wide variety of designs, from the classic biker to more sophisticated versions such as a trench coat.

Looking for inspiration for a festival look? A suede-effect bomber jacket is the perfect ally. Its relaxed yet characterful style goes perfectly with a flowy boho dress and ankle boots, creating a comfortable outfit with personality that's very much in tune with the free spirit of these events. Do you have an important date? Opt for a denim jacket in earthy tones, which, when combined with a black slip dress, provides the perfect balance between sophistication and trendiness. This contrast of textures and styles achieves an elegant yet modern outfit, ideal for dinner or a special occasion.

A suede-effect blazer is another excellent option for those looking for a garment with an elegant and modern touch. With their structured cut and the softness of the fabric, they add a sophisticated air to any look, whether day or night. These blazers adapt perfectly to both a more formal and a casual style, combining with jeans, skirts, or even dresses for special occasions. In addition, their rich and luxurious texture makes them stand out subtly, elevating any outfit with a touch of class.

Looking for a jacket that will make you stand out? Check out our selection of suede-effect jackets and find the one that best suits your style. Whether you are looking for a casual, rocker, or sophisticated look, at Stradivarius we have the perfect jacket for you.

A suede-effect blazer is another excellent option for those looking for a garment with an elegant and modern touch. With their structured cut and the softness of the fabric, they add a sophisticated air to any look, whether day or night. These blazers adapt perfectly to both a more formal and a casual style, combining with jeans, skirts, or even dresses for special occasions. In addition, their rich and luxurious texture makes them stand out subtly, elevating any outfit with a touch of class.

Looking for a jacket that will make you stand out? Check out our selection of suede-effect jackets and find the one that best suits your style. Whether you are looking for a casual, rocker, or sophisticated look, at Stradivarius we have the perfect jacket for you.

subcategories.name: Overshirts
subcategories.description:
Women's overshirts have become an essential piece in any woman's wardrobe thanks to their versatility and casual style. Their design combines the lightness of a shirt with the structure of a jacket, which makes them the perfect option for those days when you need an extra layer. In addition, their relaxed fit and comfortable fabrics make them easily adaptable to different styles and occasions.

At Stradivarius, we know that you like to express your unique style through fashion. That's why we offer you a wide range of overshirts for women, so you can find the one that best suits your personality. Whether you're looking for a classic, bohemian, rocker or minimalist style, you'll find the perfect overshirt for you in our collection.

Looking for a casual and carefree look? Our overshirts are perfect to combine with jeans, a basic t-shirt and sneakers. Add a touch of casualness to your look with an oversized denim overshirt in light denim, or go for a more rocker style with a black overshirt with worn details. If you prefer a more sophisticated style, you can opt for a beige blazer or overshirt, which you can combine with a t-shirt and dress pants or a midi skirt.

If you want to give your style a bold twist, go for a checked overshirt or a trendy print. This type of garment not only captures attention for its design, but also brings dynamism and personality to any outfit. Green overshirts, for example, are on trend this season and are perfect for adding a touch of color to your more neutral outfits. You can combine a patterned overshirt with black pants and military boots for a grunge look, or go for a more boho style with a beige overshirt with a floral print, a vest and flared pants.

For a casual and functional style, you can wear a fleece overshirt open over one of our thick knit sweaters and cardigans and jeans, creating a comfortable and textured outfit. If you prefer a more formal outfit, choose to combine it with tailored pants, a shirt and heeled ankle boots, achieving an elegant but cozy look for cold days.

Don't forget that the right accessories can make all the difference when putting together your favorite women's overshirts. A wide belt can help define your silhouette when wearing an oversized overshirt, while a neutral-toned bag will add balance and sophistication. For a more urban and polished look, add a wool hat or beret for colder days, or sunglasses and minimalist jewelry.

Discover our collection of Stradivarius women's overshirts and find the perfect garment to complete your look. Style assured!

subcategories.name: Coats
subcategories.description:
At Stradivarius, we know that a good coat is much more than just a garment to protect you from the cold. It’s a style statement that completes your look and helps you express your individuality. That’s why our women’s coat collection is designed to offer you a wide variety of options that adapt to your lifestyle, from padded coats for the coldest days to comfortable denim jackets that add a relaxed and versatile touch to your outfits.

Looking for a classic and flexible coat? Discover our trench coats, a timeless garment that never goes out of style. Available in a variety of colors, from a white women’s coat to a more elegant black trench coat, it’s the perfect garment for any occasion, as it can be easily combined with a dress and heeled boots for a sophisticated look or with jeans and sneakers for a more casual style.

If you prefer a more urban style, you will love our bomber jackets or our faux suede jackets. With their modern and casual design, they are ideal for adding a contemporary touch to any outfit. Wear them with cargo pants and ankle boots for a daring look or with leggings and a basic t-shirt for a comfortable outfit with personality. And to add an extra touch of style without losing that urban air, opting for a red women’s coat is a foolproof way to stand out with a vibrant and contemporary touch.

For the coldest days, we recommend our women’s padded coats, which are warm and comfortable. You can find them in a wide variety of colors and finishes, from classic black to pastel shades and bold prints. You can also choose between options with a hood for greater protection, or without a hood for a lighter look.

If this doesn’t convince you and you’re still looking for a coat that will keep you warm and fashionable, fur coats are an excellent option, thanks to their softness, warmth and touch of glamour. For a balanced look, combine it with basic garments, or dare with a more daring outfit, such as leather pants and a silk blouse, for a chic and sophisticated style.

Finally, if you prefer a sportier and more functional style without sacrificing style, women’s puffer jackets with padding are the perfect option, as they guarantee maximum comfort and protection against the cold thanks to their thermal insulation. You can wear it with skinny pants and high boots for a casual yet elegant look, or even with a dress and sneakers for a casual touch. And if you need an option for the coldest days, women’s long coats are ideal for keeping you warm while adding a sophisticated touch to your looks during your sports activities or outdoors.

Discover our women’s coat collection and find the perfect style for this season. No matter what it is, at Stradivarius you’ll find the coat you need to complete your look and set a trend!

subcategories.name: Jackets
subcategories.description:
Stradivarius women's jackets are the perfect garment to complete any look, from the most casual to the most sophisticated. With designs that combine style, functionality and trend, there are designs to suit all tastes and occasions. At Stradivarius you will find the perfect jacket for you. Our jacket collection is inspired by the latest trends, but always with a unique and fun touch.

Looking for a versatile jacket that you can wear with everything? Women's denim jackets are a must-have basic in any wardrobe. They are perfect for creating informal and casual looks. Combine them with jeans, a T-shirt and sneakers for a casual and comfortable look, or wear them with a dress and boots for a more dressed-up but equally stylish look. You can also opt for a trench coat to add an extra touch of style on cooler days without sacrificing comfort.

We have a wide range of washes, from the classic blue denim jacket to dark worn colors, including intermediate shades such as gray or light blue. You will also find different cuts and designs, from black women's denim jackets, ideal for an urban and casual look, to fitted ones, perfect to combine with more feminine garments.

If you are looking for a jacket that will protect you from the cold, women's padded jackets are perfect for the coldest days of winter, as they are the perfect combination of warmth, comfort and style. And if you want to elevate the outfit without losing functionality, try combining it with a blazer underneath to achieve a sophisticated look with a lot of character.

If you are looking for a practical and stylish option for the coldest days, women's double-sided jackets are an excellent choice, as they combine the exterior design with a warm and soft lining that provides warmth without sacrificing style. On the other hand, women's suede jackets add a touch of elegance and texture to any outfit. Their soft, velvety finish makes them a perfect choice for between seasons. By combining a suede effect jacket with a midi skirt, dress pants or even a printed dress, you can create a look with style and personality.

Prefer a jacket with a more rocker touch? Our women's leather jackets are perfect. An outfit with black pants, a basic t-shirt, boots and a leather biker jacket is ideal for a groundbreaking outfit, or combine it with a dress and ankle boots for a more sophisticated look.

No matter what your style is, at Stradivarius you will find the perfect jacket for you. Discover our wide selection and find your perfect outfit!

subcategories.name: Black jackets
subcategories.description:
The black jacket is more than just a fashion essential, it's a timeless piece that brings sophistication, edge, and versatility to any wardrobe. Whether you're dressing for a crisp fall afternoon or a sleek night out, a black jacket transitions seamlessly from casual to formal. At Stradivarius, we’ve curated a standout collection that includes everything from bold leather pieces to elegant trenches and tailored blazers. With options in every silhouette, from cropped to oversized, you’ll find the fit that flatters and feels like you.

A blackjacket is that rare piece that works with everything. Want to add instant edge? A faux leather jacket throws just the right amount of rebel into any look. Going for something more relaxed? A denim jacket keeps it laid-back while still being effortlessly cool. No matter your mood or style, there’s a black jacket here for it.

Looking for something that does it all? A black jacket is a fashion chameleon. Dress it up with a silk blouse and heels for a dinner date or keep it casual with joggers and trainers for your off-duty days. Fit and style make all the difference, whether you’re into sharp tailoring or relaxed shapes, Stradivarius helps you nail the look with confidence.

Nothing says “cool girl” like a black leather jacket. It's sleek, it's bold, and it's universally flattering. Layer it over a graphic tee and distressed jeans for that rock-chic vibe, or throw it over a soft slip dress to play with contrasts. Its classic cut and glossy finish ensure it’s never out of season.

Prefer something more laid-back? A black denim jacket adds easy structure and pairs with just about anything. Ideal for transitional weather, it’s light enough to layer and stylish enough to stand alone. Over a hoodie or a floral dress, it nails the balance between casual and curated.

For a more elevated outerwear option, a black trench coat offers elegance and warmth wrapped into one. The long silhouette elongates the figure, while the belt draws attention to the waist for a flattering fit. Ideal for both work commutes and weekend brunches, it’s a staple for crisp-weather style.

Need something smart and structured? A black blazer for ladies is the answer. It instantly elevates any outfit, from tailored trousers to ripped jeans. Worn buttoned-up or left open over a tank top, it brings polish and confidence to the everyday wardrobe.

When winter calls, answer with a black puffer jacket for ladies. Its quilted finish and cozy insulation make it a cold-weather must-have. Combine with chunky boots, knitwear, and your favorite scarf to stay warm without sacrificing your sense of style.

Our collection of STR Teen jackets brings youthful energy into the mix with trend-led designs that keep comfort at the core. From cropped biker styles to oversized layers, these pieces are made for movement and individuality, perfect for school days, hangouts, or weekend adventures.

At Stradivarius, we believe that great style starts with timeless pieces, and the black jacket is one of them. Whether you lean edgy, polished, or somewhere in between, our collection helps you build looks you love season after season. Explore now to find the black jacket that completes your closet!

subcategories.name: Navy blue jackets
subcategories.description:
Why Choose a Navy Blue Jacket?
Navy blue is a color that exudes serenity and elegance, making it easy to integrate into any outfit. Here are some reasons why a navy blue jacket is a must-have in your wardrobe:

Versatility: Navy blue jackets pair well with a wide range of colors, from neutral tones like white, black, or beige to bolder options like fuchsia or mustard yellow.

Timeless Style: This classic color never goes out of fashion, making navy blue jackets a smart investment.

Suitable for All Seasons: Depending on the material, you can find options perfect for spring, autumn, or winter.

Types of Navy Blue Jackets for Women
 The market offers a wide variety of designs to suit different styles and needs. Here are some of the most popular options:

Navy Blue Blazers: Perfect for a professional look or to add a touch of sophistication to your outfit. Pair them with tailored trousers or a pencil skirt for a flawless style.

Puffer Jackets: Great for staying warm on colder days without sacrificing style. Knit Jackets: A comfortable and versatile option for transitional weather.

Navy Blue Denim Jackets: Ideal for a casual and modern look. They pair wonderfully with basic t-shirts and sneakers.

How to Style Your Navy Blue Jacket
One of the main advantages of navy blue jackets is how easy they are to style. Here are some ideas to inspire you:

Casual Look: Pair your navy blue jacket with white jeans, a basic t-shirt, and sneakers for a relaxed and modern vibe.

Formal Look: Go for a navy blue blazer with black tailored trousers and a white blouse. Add heels and minimalist accessories for an elegant outfit.

Night Out Look: Wear your navy blue jacket with a black midi dress and metallic-toned accessories like gold or silver.

Shop Navy Blue Jackets for Women At Stradivarius, we offer a wide selection of navy blue jackets designed to suit any occasion.

Our models combine the latest trends with the comfort and quality you need. Browse our online store and find the design that best suits your style. Place your order today and receive it at the comfort of your home or pick it up in-store.

Ready to Refresh Your Wardrobe?

Don’t wait any longer—add a navy blue jacket to your collection. This piece will be your best ally for looking elegant and stylish at any moment. Meta Description: Discover navy blue jackets for women at Stradivarius. Elegant, versatile designs perfect for any occasion. Shop online now!

subcategories.name: Bikers
subcategories.description:
The biker jacket, that iconic garment that has conquered runways and streets alike, is reinvented at Stradivarius with endless possibilities. Beyond its rebellious and daring essence, the women's biker jacket becomes a versatile basic capable of adapting to any style and occasion. From classic black to vibrant tones, through quilted designs or with unique details, you will find the perfect look to express your individuality.

Our collection of women's faux leather jackets gives you the possibility to create outfits that range from the most rocker to the most chic effortlessly. Dare to explore all the possibilities that we offer and find your perfect companion for this season. If you are looking for something softer and more elegant, don't miss our collection of faux suede jackets, an ideal option to add a touch of sophistication to your everyday looks.

Discover the quilted faux leather biker jacket, perfect for the coldest days. Its design combines the warmth of a light padding with the timeless style of synthetic leather, ideal for giving a sophisticated twist to your winter looks. Wear it with straight jeans and ankle boots for a functional and stylish outfit.

If you prefer a relaxed style without sacrificing visual impact, the oversized faux leather jacket or the double-faced faux leather jacket is for you. As with oversized denim jackets, its wide silhouette allows you to easily layer, providing a modern and carefree air. Try combining it with a basic T-shirt and wide leg pants for a look with attitude.

And if you are looking for an elegant option for your evening plans, go for a faux leather blazer. Its structured cut and polished finish make it a versatile garment that you can wear with both a slip dress and tailored pants. You can combine it with a slip dress for a more feminine and daring look, or with tailored pants for a more classic and refined option.

At Stradivarius, you will find a wide variety of STR Teen jackets to choose from: from a long faux leather coat to models with studs, zippers or belts that add a touch of rebellion to your look.

Dare to experiment with different styles and play with the most daring options, from the classic to the most modern. Find the biker jacket that best suits your personality and elevate your look to another level. Make it yours and make a difference!

subcategories.name: Trench
subcategories.description:
Women's trench coats and parkas are garments in any wardrobe, capable of elevating your style while protecting you from the elements. At Stradivarius, you will find a wide selection of trench coats and parkas designed to adapt to your lifestyle, from classic and timeless models to more modern and daring options. These versatile jackets allow you to express your personal style without sacrificing comfort or protection against the elements.

The women's trench coat is an iconic garment that has transcended the barriers of time and has become an basic. Its versatility allows you to combine it with a wide range of garments, from jeans and basic t-shirts for a relaxed urban look, to dress pants and blazers for a more sophisticated style.

In our collection we offer a wide variety of trench coats, from the classic beige to models in other colors such as black, navy blue or green. You will also find short women's trench coats, long trench coats and even waterproof trench coats so you can face any weather situation in style.

Women's parkas have become a favorite of many thanks to their casual style and great versatility. They are the perfect garment for the coldest days, as they are usually made with warm and water-resistant fabrics, and they are also very practical for everyday use thanks to their design with a hood and pockets.

Also, within our STR Teen jackets you can also find ideal options to complete your looks with a more youthful and modern air. Our denim jackets, for example, are a timeless basic that goes with everything from dresses to cargo pants, perfect for a casual style with a 90s touch. On the other hand, our faux suede jackets provide a soft and elegant finish, ideal for elevating any outfit without losing comfort. These options further expand the possibilities for creating unique styles, adapted to your pace of life and each season.

Whether you are looking for an elegant black women's trench coat to complete your most sophisticated looks or if you prefer a comfortable and stylish parka for day to day, at Stradivarius you will find the perfect garment for you. Discover our collection and choose the one that best suits your style!

subcategories.name: Blazers
subcategories.description:
Women's blazers have become a must-have basic in any wardrobe. Their versatility makes them the perfect garment to create looks for different styles, from the most formal to the most casual. At Stradivarius you will find a wide variety of women's blazer jackets, in different colors, fabrics and prints.

As we were saying, blazer jackets are a very versatile garment that can be worn for both formal and informal looks. For an office look, you can combine a black women's blazer with dress pants and a white shirt, while if you are looking for a more casual look, you can combine a women's checkered blazer with jeans and a basic t-shirt.

Blazer jackets are also perfect for between seasons, as they are not too warm but protect you from the cold in style. Their structured cut adds a sophisticated touch even to the simplest looks, making them a flexible option for both everyday wear and more formal occasions. You can wear a navy blue women's blazer with a trench coat if it's chilly and you're looking for a more elegant air, or combine a red blazer with a denim jacket to achieve a more urban and casual look.

If you are looking for a blazer for a special event, you can opt for a sequined blazer or one with lace details. This style is perfect to combine with a party dress or palazzo pants. And for an event with a casual and chic look, try combining an oversized navy blue women's blazer with cycling shorts and sneakers. Finally, for the most sophisticated look, you can opt for a tailored blazer with a midi skirt and heeled ankle boots. The possibilities are endless!

If you like options with more textures and an original finish, in our collection of suede-effect jackets you will find options similar to blazers, which have a soft and warm surface ideal for creating fall or mid-season outfits with an elegant and different touch.

Lastly, when choosing a blazer, it is important that you take your body type into account. If you are short, cropped blazers will suit you, as they will make you appear taller and more proportionate, as they will not overwhelm your figure. On the other hand, if you are tall, you can afford to wear longer blazers or oversized cuts, which will not only give you a modern and casual air, but also allow you to play with the contrast between volume and tightness in the rest of the look.

If you are looking for a garment that will help you create stylish looks and is easy to combine, a blazer is the perfect option. At Stradivarius you will find a wide variety of this style of women's jacket, in different colors, fabrics and prints. Find yours!

subcategories.name: Waistcoats
subcategories.description:
Stradivarius Women's Gilets: The Versatile Garment You Need 

Stradivarius women's gilets are one of the most versatile and stylish pieces you can add to your wardrobe. This timeless item adapts to any season, allowing you to create modern and fashionable looks, ranging from the most casual to the most sophisticated. 

Crafted from high-quality materials, Stradivarius gilets offer a wide variety of designs, from classic to cutting-edge. You can choose padded gilets for colder days or opt for lighter versions to complement your outfit in spring or summer. The versatility of these gilets makes them easy to pair with shirts, dresses or even jumpers, adding an extra layer of style to any ensemble. 

In addition to their appealing design, Stradivarius women's gilets are noted for their comfort and functionality. They are perfect for those seeking a lightweight garment that adds a distinctive touch without compromising on comfort. Ideal for both formal and casual occasions, gilets allow you to play with layers, adding depth and texture to your outfits. 

Incorporate a Stradivarius gilet into your daily looks and enjoy a garment that will accompany you throughout the year, keeping you on trend for every occasion.

subcategories.name: Denim
subcategories.description:
The denim jacket is a timeless garment that no woman's wardrobe should be without. Its versatility makes it the ideal option for any occasion, from a casual look for day to day to a more dressed-up outfit for the evening. At Stradivarius, you will find a wide variety of denim jackets for women, from classic denim jackets to more modern and sophisticated designs.

Women's denim jackets are perfect for between seasons, as they provide just the right amount of warmth without being too heavy. They are also very easy to combine with other garments, which makes them an basic in any wardrobe. In our collection of denim jackets, you will find everything from oversized models to more fitted designs, with different washes, rips, and details that make them unique.

If you are looking for a daring look, go for a black denim jacket. Its dark tone creates contrast and adds a rocker touch to any outfit. Pair it with basic or eye-catching garments, and complete the look with buckle boots or metallic accessories to enhance that stylish attitude. If you want a light look with spring vibes, a white denim jacket is a surefire option. Its soft color brightens up any outfit and combines perfectly with flowing fabrics and prints.

If you are looking for a different denim jacket, go for an oversized leather-effect denim jacket, which is very trendy and perfect for creating comfortable and stylish looks. Its wide cut allows you to play with layers, making it an ideal option for between seasons. You can wear it with leggings and a short top for a relaxed look, or combine it with boyfriend jeans for a total denim outfit.

Another alternative with a lot of character is the long denim jackets for women, which, like blazers, are ideal for those who want a versatile garment with an extra touch of sophistication. This type of design stylizes the silhouette and provides an elegant air without losing the casual essence of denim.

In addition to the classic denim jackets, at Stradivarius you will also find other ideal options to complete your wardrobe for mid-season and colder days. For those looking for an alternative with more coverage and a sophisticated air, women's trench coats and parkas are perfect: versatile, comfortable, and always in fashion. And if you need a warm garment without sacrificing style, our padded jackets become the option to face winter with a modern and functional look.

At Stradivarius, you will find the perfect denim jacket to complete your look. Don't wait any longer to discover our collection!

seoCategory.name: Jackets
seoCategory.title: Women’s Jackets | Stradivarius {0}
seoCategory.metaDescription: FREE STORE SHIPPING | Discover our incredible collection of {1} on Stradivarius. Find the latest styles and fashion trends in dresses, pants and much more.
seoCategory.longDescription:
From jackets to blazer-style coats, Stradivarius women's jackets come in as many versions as you do. Because you don't wake up every day with the same mood, your jacket shouldn't be the same either. Yes, we know. 

One of the garments that constantly makes its way in and out of your wardrobe is the biker jacket; a piece that self-proclaims itself as the favorite transitional jacket year after year for both girls and boys. Logical, few garments are as versatile as this one, accepting everything from loose and urban silhouettes, like the oversized denim jacket, to more fitted and cropped styles. That's why this season we haven't forgotten to include the warmest version of this must-have in our collection: the shearling-lined denim jacket. With its soft and furry interior, no cold weather can resist it.

 A denim jacket, regardless of the style, will never let you down. That's a fact. Just like women's knit jackets, which can serve as an extra layer for those days when the chill catches you off guard or as a cool pseudo-sweater, subtly revealing a lace bralette (then don't say we didn't give you ideas ;). On the sportier side, the women's anorak is the best friend of those who feel the chill the most. Mind you, just because it's sporty doesn't mean you can only wear it to the gym. Stradivarius' women's anoraks and jackets are so beautiful and versatile that you can create HI-LO looks with more sophisticated pieces. 

Our collection is full of styling ideas for you to get inspired. Go ahead and take a look. Feathers, padding, or shearling? Not everyone feels the cold the same way, which is why our collection of women's winter jackets is as extensive as the degrees a thermometer can drop. Okay, maybe we don't have jackets for a trip to the North Pole, we won't deceive you. But speaking of traveling, did you know that a lightweight down jacket is the best? It's comfortable, equally warm, takes up very little space, and doesn't feel heavy at all. If you're someone who likes to move freely without being bothered by clothes, you'll love the women's down vest above all else. The romance continues with a design that exudes folk vibes through the sleeves, collar, and zipper, but above all, through its interior. We're talking about the women's shearling jacket, a style that transcends trends and adapts to them without succumbing. 

This is the case of the aviator or shearling jacket, with a leather exterior and shearling interior, paying homage to the vintage pilot jacket. We're sure that if you rummage through your parents' closets, you'll find one from the '80s, but just in case they weren't cautious and got rid of it without consulting you, here you'll find that aviator jacket and many more women's coats for this fall-winter. Transitional and winter jackets for everyday wear. 

We need our wardrobe to make life easier, not complicate it, right? That's why it's always better to have a versatile and stylish collection of women's jackets on hand that looks good with any outfit, even when dressing in the dark.

subcategories.name: Knitwear
subcategories.description:
This season, knitwear transcends mere comfort to become a symbol of luxury. It's no longer just about being cosy; it's about making a statement and creating looks worthy of an Instagram feed. 

At Stradivarius, we want you to fully embrace this trend, which is why we're introducing you to the must-have knitwear pieces for your wardrobe. All you need to do is select the silhouette, garment, and pattern or colour that best suits your style. 

For those looking to inject personality into their outfits, knitwear pieces with traditional patterns like jacquard are ideal. A brightly coloured knitted vest can lift even the gloomiest of days. If you're aiming to take your style to the next level, total knitwear looks and neutral tones are essential this season. Pair a high-neck jumper with the right accessories and you'll achieve a cover-worthy look. 

And let's not forget about Stradivarius knit dresses, perfect for any occasion. Knitted vests have become the standout piece of this autumn-winter season, perfect for layering and playing with different combinations without compromising on style. 
Even on warmer days, you can opt for a crochet vest to maintain your style without overheating. Knitted dresses are a perfect choice for the colder months, especially when paired with high boots or a long dress for an elegant and comfortable look. Jersey dresses with XL boots are a rising trend, as is the classic Little Black Dress in knit format. 

Jumpers, especially high-neck ones, are essential this season. From classic designs to cut-out details, there are options to suit every taste. Knitwear sets, like the twin-set of cardigan and top, offer a versatile and elegant option. 
Alternatively, you can opt for a knitted tracksuit for a comfortable yet chic style. Long knitted jackets are perfect as a standalone outerwear piece on transitional weather days

subcategories.name: Cardigan
subcategories.description:
Discover the perfect women's cardigan to complement your unique style. From classic neutrals to bold pops of color, our range of cardigans offers endless possibilities. Explore different lengths, textures, and designs to find the ideal piece to express your personality.

A long cardigan is an excellent choice for adding a touch of effortless elegance to your look. Drape it over jeans and a tee for a casual yet chic vibe, or pair it with a dress for a more sophisticated ensemble. The versatility of a long cardigan makes it a must-have in any fashion-forward wardrobe.

For a more playful and trendy option, consider a cropped cardigan. This style is perfect for showing off your waistline and adding a touch of youthful energy to your outfit. Wear it with high-waisted jeans or a skirt for a flattering and stylish look.

Add a pop of color to your wardrobe with a vibrant red cardigan or a cheerful pink cardigan. These statement pieces are sure to turn heads and brighten up any day. Alternatively, embrace classic elegance with a timeless white cardigan or a sophisticated black cardigan. Don't forget the understated charm of a brown cardigan or the fresh appeal of a green cardigan.

Explore our collection of knit clothing for even more cozy options. Embrace the bohemian spirit with a charming crochet cardigan. These intricately designed pieces add a touch of texture and visual interest to any outfit. Perfect for layering over a simple top or dress, a crochet cardigan is a stylish way to express your unique personality.

Stay cool and comfortable with a short-sleeved cardigan. Ideal for warmer weather or layering under jackets, these versatile pieces offer a touch of style without sacrificing comfort. Pair them with jeans, skirts, or dresses for endless outfit possibilities.

Styling your cardigan is all about expressing yourself. Pair your favorite cardigan with our trendy jeans or trousers for a casual yet stylish look. Or, dress it up with our stunning dresses or skirts for a more sophisticated vibe.

No matter your style, a cardigan is a versatile piece in any wardrobe. Explore the Stradivarius collection today and discover the perfect cardigan to express your unique personality and elevate your look! Find your perfect black cardigan for women today!

subcategories.name: Dresses
subcategories.description:
Wrap yourself in comfort and style with our collection ofknitted dresses for women. Perfect for any occasion, from casual outings to evening events, these dressesoffer a blend of effortless chic and cozy warmth. Discover the perfect knit dress to elevate your wardrobe!

Explore the versatility of women's knitwear, a wardrobe staple that transitions seamlessly through seasons. Whether you're looking for a chic black knit dress or a vibrant statement piece, our range has something for everyone. From lightweight knits perfect for layering in spring and autumn, to cozy chunky womens’ sweater dresses ideal for colder months, knitwear offers both style and comfort year-round.

Embrace the comfort of a jumper dress, ideal for layering during cooler months. Pair it with your favorite jackets and boots for a stylish and cozy ensemble. The relaxed fit and soft textures make it a go-to choice for everyday wear, offering both comfort and style without compromising on fashion.

subcategories.name: Sweaters
subcategories.description:
Stay cozy and stylish with our Stradivarius collection of sweaters. Find the perfect piece to elevate your everyday look. Whether you're looking for something classic or trendy, we've got you covered with a wide variety of styles and colors. Embrace the comfort and versatility of our women’s jumpers and express your unique style with confidence!

Our range of knit sweaters for women offers something for every occasion. From relaxed weekend vibes to chic everyday wear, discover the perfect piece to complement your personal style. Whether you're layering up for colder days or adding a touch of texture to your outfit, our sweaters are designed to keep you feeling comfortable and looking fabulous.

Consider a timeless black sweater for effortless sophistication, perfect for pairing with tailored trousers, skirts, or classic denim. If you want to make a bold statement, a vibrant red sweater adds energy and personality to any outfit. A classic white sweater provides endless versatility, easily dressed up with accessories or kept casual with jeans. Meanwhile, a pink sweater introduces a playful touch of color, ideal for brightening up your everyday looks. Together, these shades highlight the adaptability of knit clothing, making it simple to create outfits for any mood or occasion.

Looking for something a little different? A cropped sweater is a trendy option that pairs perfectly with high-waisted jeans, tailored trousers, or even a pleated midi skirt for a playful, modern look. Layer it over a collared shirt for added dimension or wear it alone to highlight its stylish cut.

A v-neck sweater is also a classic and flattering choice that works well on its own or layered over a blouse for a polished, versatile outfit. Pair it with skinny jeans for a casual-chic vibe, wide-leg trousers for a sophisticated office look, or tuck it into a skirt or dress for an effortlessly elegant ensemble. Both styles offer endless possibilities to mix and match, allowing you to create outfits that suit any occasion or mood.

Whether you prefer a classic cable knit or a trendy oversized style, you can find the perfect knitted jumper to express your individuality in our collection. With so many options to choose from, you're sure to find the perfect piece to elevate your wardrobe!

Express yourself through fashion and embrace the confidence that comes with finding your perfect style. Each sweater from our collection is designed to empower you to explore and express your unique personality. Feel comfortable, feel confident, and let your style shine!
