subcategories.description:
En Stradivarius te ofrecemos las sandalias de mujer con las que estar a la última esta temporada. Siéntete la más cool encima de unas sandalias de plataforma o enfundada en unas sandalias de tiras. Si algo tenemos claro, es que con unas sandalias de tacón te sentirás una auténtica diva. Y es que cuando hablamos de sandalias hay muchos modelos que son atemporales. Como las sandalias de tacón ancho: unas sandalias básicas que te ayudaran a convertir un look sencillo en un look único e increíble. 

También podremos encontrar sandalias de piel, si lo que estamos buscando es calidad y confort. Como ha sucedido en años anteriores, las sandalias de tacón ancho son un must en nuestro armario. Las tenemos disponibles en todas sus versiones: con tiras atadas al tobillo, con hebilla atada al tobillo, con apliques y con diferentes materiales. Pero tranquila, si buscas más opciones te ofrecemos también las sandalias de cuña, muy versátiles y cómodas para lucir en verano. Este año, además, viene muy fuerte la tendencia de las sandalias plataforma. Gracias a este tipo de calzado te sentirás arreglada, muy cómoda, segura y poderosa.

Estas sandalias las podrás encontrar en colores dorados, plateados o metalizados ¡siéntete cómoda para salir a la calle! Además de las sandalias plataforma, no nos vamos a cansar de ver por la calle las sandalias romanas en diferentes colores como marrón, negro y colores más llamativos.

LAS SANDALIAS DE FIESTA CON LAS QUE ESTARÁS A LA ÚLTIMAÚltimamente tenemos muchas ganas de salir y disfrutar de los buenos momentos. Y para eso, tenemos una gran variedad de sandalias atadas con las que podrás disfrutar de estos momentos junto a los tuyos. Atrévete con unas sandalias de taconazo. Este año hemos visto en la pasarela que los colores llamativos como lima, rosa, rojo o amarillo están a la última, ¡vamos a meterle color a nuestros looks con unas sandalias de color!Ahora que se acerca el verano y el buen tiempo, tenemos muchas ganas de ponernos unas mules. Un calzado cómodo y versátil con el podrás tanto ir a la oficina como salir a dar una vuelta con tus amigos. En nuestra colección ofrecemos diferentes tipos de mules, con tacón de metacrilato, de vinilo, con materiales acolchados, transparentes… Son un must este verano y… ¡no te puedes quedar sin ellas!

subcategories.name: Boots and ankle boots
subcategories.description:
Explore our diverse range of women's boots, crafted with attention to detail and premium materials. Whether you're looking for a classic silhouette or a bold, contemporary design, we have the perfect pair to complete your look.

Timeless and versatile, Chelsea boots are a must-have in every wardrobe. These easy-to-wear classics offer a sleek and sophisticated look, perfect for both casual and dressy occasions. Pair them with jeans for a relaxed vibe or dress them up with a skirt or dress for a more polished ensemble.

Make a statement with our selection of black boots. From edgy combat boots to elegant heeled styles, black boots are a wardrobe staple that can be dressed up or down. They add a touch of effortless cool to any outfit and are perfect for transitioning between seasons.

Add a touch of warmth to your look with our collection of brown boots. These versatile boots are perfect for creating a cozy and stylish outfit during the colder months. Pair them with jeans, leggings, or a sweater dress for a chic and comfortable look. Consider women's ankle boots in shades of tan or chocolate brown for a rustic and earthy vibe.

For a fresh and modern look, explore our collection of white boots. These statement-making boots are perfect for adding a touch of brightness to any outfit. Pair them with denim, dresses, or skirts for a fashion-forward ensemble.

Elevate your style with our collection of heeled boots. From chunky block heels to sleek stilettos, heeled boots add a touch of glamour to any outfit. Wear them with dresses, skirts, or jeans for a chic and confident look that will turn heads. Whether you're looking for a subtle lift or a dramatic statement, our heeled boots will amplify your look.

Make a bold statement with our collection of burgundy boots. This rich and luxurious color adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit. Pair them with neutral tones for a refined look or mix and match with other bold colors for a daring ensemble. Burgundy boots are a unique and stylish choice that will set you apart from the crowd.

Ready to step up your shoe game? Discover the perfect pair of boots that reflects your unique style and empowers you to conquer the world, one step at a time. Check out our leather shoes, heeled shoes, flat shoes, wide fit shoes and bags and backpacks to complete your look!

subcategories.name: Trainers
subcategories.description:
Step up your shoe game with our collection of trainers, designed for the modern woman who values both style and comfort. Whether you're hitting the gym, exploring the city, or simply looking for a cool and casual everyday look, our range of women's trainers has something for everyone. Find your perfect pair and express your unique style with Stradivarius!

Our selection of trainers is constantly updated with the latest trends, ensuring you always have access to the freshest styles. From classic white trainers to bold, statement-making designs, we've got the perfect kicks to complete any outfit. We understand that fashion is an expression of yourself, so we offer a diverse range to suit every personality.

Looking for something sporty and functional? Check out our collection of running shoes, designed to provide support and comfort during your workouts. With features like cushioned soles and breathable materials, these trainers will help you reach your fitness goals in style. We focus on both performance and design, so you can focus on you.

For a sleek and versatile option, explore our ladies' black trainers. These go-with-everything shoes are perfect for creating effortless everyday looks. Pair them with jeans, dresses, shorts, or even skorts for a touch of sporty chic. Black trainers for women are a wardrobe staple, easily styled with a variety of outfits.

If you love a dark aesthetic, we have a wide selection of black trainers available. Ranging from sleek and minimalist designs to bold and chunky styles, you're sure to find the perfect pair to match your style. Black trainers offer a chic and understated look that is very easy to pair with jackets and jeans.

Love a clean and classic aesthetic? Our white trainers for women are a must-have. These pristine kicks add a touch of freshness to any outfit and can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion. White trainers are incredibly versatile; try them with jeans, a skirt, or even a dress for a contemporary edge. For a more specific search, consider looking at white trainers for a wide range of options.

When it comes to comfort and practicality, our walking shoes for women are an excellent choice. Designed with supportive soles and durable materials, these trainers are perfect for long walks and everyday adventures. You can explore the city in style with comfort and support.

Complete your wardrobe with the perfect footwear! Our trainers are designed to make you feel confident and stylish, no matter what you're doing. Find your perfect pair and express yourself with Stradivarius. Explore your style and express your individuality!

subcategories.name: Ballet flats
subcategories.description:
Our collection features a wide array of styles to suit every taste. From classic black ballet flats that offer timeless sophistication to vibrant red ballet flats that add a pop of color, you'll find the perfect pair to complement your unique style. Each pair is crafted with attention to detail, ensuring both comfort and durability. Explore our range and find your new go-to shoes!

Beyond the standard colors and materials, our women's ballet flats collection also includes unique embellishments and design elements. Discover ballet flats adorned with delicate bows, subtle buckles, or intricate stitching. We also offer pointed-toe ballet flats for a more sophisticated and streamlined silhouette, as well as round-toe styles for a classic and comfortable fit.

Looking for something neutral? Our nude ballet flats are an excellent choice. They elongate the legs and blend seamlessly with any outfit. Alternatively, brown ballet flats provide a warm and earthy tone, perfect for autumnal looks. For a touch of glamour, consider our gold or silver ballet flats, ideal for adding a subtle sparkle to your ensemble. Don't forget about our delicate pink ballet flats, offering a soft and feminine touch.

Nude ballet flats are a wardrobe chameleon. They work equally well with tailored trousers for a professional setting or a flowy sundress for a relaxed weekend outing. Brown ballet flats offer versatility, complementing everything from denim to corduroy. Gold and silver ballet flats are perfect for adding a touch of festive elegance to any occasion, transforming a simple outfit into something special. And pink ballet flats can soften a bold look or complement a romantic aesthetic. Experiment with different shades and textures to find the neutral flat shoes that best express your style.

We also offer a variety of materials to suit your preferences. Our leather ballet flats provide a luxurious feel and exceptional durability, promising to be a long-lasting addition to your shoe collection. Meanwhile, our white ballet flats offer a fresh and clean look, perfect for summer days or adding a bright touch to any outfit. With so many options available, finding your ideal match is easier than ever!

Complete your look with other Stradivarius basics! Pair your ballet flats with our stylish jeans for a relaxed yet chic vibe, or opt for a flowy skirt or elegant dresses for a more polished appearance. Don't forget to check out our trousers for versatile options that can be dressed up or down.

Embrace the comfort and versatility of ballet flats and let your personal style shine. At Stradivarius, we believe fashion should be fun and expressive, so explore our collection today and discover your new favorite pair!

subcategories.name: Leather
subcategories.description:
Step into effortless style and comfort with our collection of leather flat shoes. Perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to your everyday look, our leather flat shoes are designed for the modern woman on the go. Discover the perfect blend of fashion and function with our range of women's leather flat shoes!

At Stradivarius, we believe that fashion should be fun, accessible, and empowering. That’s why our leather flat shoes are designed to make you feel confident and comfortable, no matter where your day takes you. From running errands to meeting friends for coffee, our flats are the perfect choice for any occasion. 

Crafted from high-quality leather, our leather ballet flats are a timeless classic that will never go out of style. Whether you prefer a sleek and minimalist design or something with a bit more embellishment, we have a pair of flats to suit every taste. 

Our black leather flats are a wardrobe staple that can be dressed up or down. Pair them with jeans and a t-shirt for a casual weekend look, or wear them with a dress for a more polished ensemble. The versatility of black flats makes them a must-have for any fashion-conscious woman.

Looking for something a little different? Our brown leather flats are a great alternative to black. They add warmth and sophistication to any outfit, and they pair well with a variety of colors and textures. Consider pairing them with bags from our accessories collection to complete your look.

For a fresh and modern look, try our white leather flats. They are perfect for adding a touch of brightness to your outfit, and they look especially chic during the warmer months. White flats are a great way to make a statement without sacrificing comfort.

Our ladies' leather flat shoes are not only stylish but also incredibly comfortable. We understand that you’re on your feet all day, so we’ve designed our flats to provide the support you need to stay comfortable from morning to night. From the office to the streets, our leather shoes have you covered.

And for warmer weather, flat sandals are a stylish and breathable alternative that keeps things light and easy. If you’re aiming for a bolder look, consider swapping your flats for ankle boots, perfect for adding an edge to your outfit while staying true to your personal style

Ready to elevate your footwear game? Explore our collection of leather flat shoes today and discover the perfect pair to complement your unique style. With a variety of colors, styles, and sizes to choose from, you're sure to find the flats of your dreams! Let your style shine from the ground up!

subcategories.name: Sandals
subcategories.description:
En Stradivarius te ofrecemos las sandalias de mujer con las que estar a la última esta temporada. Siéntete la más cool encima de unas sandalias de plataforma o enfundada en unas sandalias de tiras. Si algo tenemos claro, es que con unas sandalias de tacón te sentirás una auténtica diva. Y es que cuando hablamos de sandalias hay muchos modelos que son atemporales. Como las sandalias de tacón ancho: unas sandalias básicas que te ayudaran a convertir un look sencillo en un look único e increíble. 

También podremos encontrar sandalias de piel, si lo que estamos buscando es calidad y confort. Como ha sucedido en años anteriores, las sandalias de tacón ancho son un must en nuestro armario. Las tenemos disponibles en todas sus versiones: con tiras atadas al tobillo, con hebilla atada al tobillo, con apliques y con diferentes materiales. Pero tranquila, si buscas más opciones te ofrecemos también las sandalias de cuña, muy versátiles y cómodas para lucir en verano. Este año, además, viene muy fuerte la tendencia de las sandalias plataforma. Gracias a este tipo de calzado te sentirás arreglada, muy cómoda, segura y poderosa.

Estas sandalias las podrás encontrar en colores dorados, plateados o metalizados ¡siéntete cómoda para salir a la calle! Además de las sandalias plataforma, no nos vamos a cansar de ver por la calle las sandalias romanas en diferentes colores como marrón, negro y colores más llamativos.

LAS SANDALIAS DE FIESTA CON LAS QUE ESTARÁS A LA ÚLTIMAÚltimamente tenemos muchas ganas de salir y disfrutar de los buenos momentos. Y para eso, tenemos una gran variedad de sandalias atadas con las que podrás disfrutar de estos momentos junto a los tuyos. Atrévete con unas sandalias de taconazo. Este año hemos visto en la pasarela que los colores llamativos como lima, rosa, rojo o amarillo están a la última, ¡vamos a meterle color a nuestros looks con unas sandalias de color!Ahora que se acerca el verano y el buen tiempo, tenemos muchas ganas de ponernos unas mules. Un calzado cómodo y versátil con el podrás tanto ir a la oficina como salir a dar una vuelta con tus amigos. En nuestra colección ofrecemos diferentes tipos de mules, con tacón de metacrilato, de vinilo, con materiales acolchados, transparentes… Son un must este verano y… ¡no te puedes quedar sin ellas!

subcategories.name: Heeled sandals
subcategories.description:
Step into style with our collection of heeled sandals. Perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any outfit, our range of women's heeled sandals are designed to keep you looking and feeling fabulous. Whether you're heading out for a night on the town or just want to elevate your everyday look, we've got the perfect pair for you. From classic designs to trendy new arrivals, explore our selection and find your next go-to footwear.

Elevate your look with a pair of chic heel sandals. Perfect for warmer days and nights, these sandals offer both style and comfort. Choose from a variety of heel heights, from low heeled sandals for all-day wear to daring stilettos for special occasions. Our selection includes a wide array of colors and materials to suit your unique taste.

Shine bright with our gold high-heeled sandals. These glamorous options are perfect for parties and events, adding a touch of sparkle to your outfit.

Pair them with your favorite dresses or skirts for a show-stopping look. Don't forget to check out our collection of dresses and skirts to complete your outfit. For a fresh and clean look, opt for our white heeled sandals. These versatile sandals can be styled with everything from jeans and trousers to flowy dresses. They're a must-have for your summer wardrobe. Explore our range of trousers and dresses to find the perfect pairings. Or try nude heel sandals for a more subtle look.

Embrace the effortless elegance of white heels, a versatile addition to your summer wardrobe. These sandals offer a fresh and clean aesthetic, complementing a wide range of outfits and occasions. Whether you're pairing them with denim shorts for a casual daytime look or a flowing maxi dress for a romantic evening out, white heels add a touch of sophistication to any ensemble.

Looking for something comfortable yet stylish? Our mid-heel sandals are the perfect choice. These sandals offer the ideal balance of height and comfort, allowing you to stay on your feet all day or night. They're great for both casual and dressy occasions. Our ladies' heeled sandals collection has something for everyone.

Ready to find your perfect pair of heeled sandals? Explore our collection today and discover the latest trends and timeless classics. With a variety of styles, colors, and heel heights to choose from, you're sure to find the perfect sandals to elevate your look. Don't forget to check out our full range of shoes, including flat sandals, to cover all your footwear needs. Find your style, express yourself, and step out with confidence!

subcategories.name: Flat sandals
subcategories.description:
Step into effortless style with flat sandals from Stradivarius. Perfect for adding a touch of cool to your everyday looks, our collection offers something for everyone. From simple slides to more elaborate designs, you’ll find the perfect pair to complement your personal style. Explore our range and discover the comfort and versatility of women's flat sandals.

Elevate your summer wardrobe with our diverse selection of flat sandals. Whether you're strolling through the city or relaxing by the beach, flat sandals offer the perfect combination of style and comfort. Check out the latest trends in jeans, trousers, dresses, skirts, and shorts to pair with your new sandals.

Our strappy flat sandals are a must-have for adding a touch of elegance to any outfit. These sandals feature delicate straps that wrap around your feet, creating a chic and sophisticated look. They’re perfect for pairing with summer dresses or skirts for a night out.

For a classic and timeless look, consider our leather flat sandals. Crafted from high-quality materials, these sandals offer both durability and style. They're versatile enough to be worn with anything from jeans to dresses, making them a wardrobe staple.

Looking for something a bit more glamorous? Our gold flat sandals are the perfect choice. These sandals add a touch of sparkle to any outfit, making them ideal for special occasions or adding a bit of flair to your everyday look. Pair them with a flowy dress or your favorite jeans for a stylish ensemble.

Keep it simple and chic with our white flat sandals. These sandals are perfect for creating a fresh and clean look. They’re versatile enough to be worn with anything from denim shorts to sundresses.

For a versatile option that goes with everything, our black flat sandals are a wardrobe basic. These sandals are perfect for creating a sleek and sophisticated look. They can be dressed up or down, making them ideal for any occasion.

Embrace earthy tones with our brown flat sandals, perfect for adding a natural touch to your style. These sandals pair beautifully with denim, linen, and other natural fabrics, creating a relaxed and effortless look.

For a subtle and sophisticated choice, our nude flat sandals are a must-have. These sandals create a leg-lengthening effect and blend seamlessly with any outfit, making them incredibly versatile.

Discover the perfect fit and style with our extensive range of ladies' flat sandals. We offer a variety of sizes and designs to ensure you find the perfect pair to suit your individual preferences.

También podremos encontrar sandalias de piel, si lo que estamos buscando es calidad y confort. Como ha sucedido en años anteriores, las sandalias de tacón ancho son un must en nuestro armario. Las tenemos disponibles en todas sus versiones: con tiras atadas al tobillo, con hebilla atada al tobillo, con apliques y con diferentes materiales. Pero tranquila, si buscas más opciones te ofrecemos también las sandalias de cuña, muy versátiles y cómodas para lucir en verano. Este año, además, viene muy fuerte la tendencia de las sandalias plataforma. Gracias a este tipo de calzado te sentirás arreglada, muy cómoda, segura y poderosa.

Estas sandalias las podrás encontrar en colores dorados, plateados o metalizados ¡siéntete cómoda para salir a la calle! Además de las sandalias plataforma, no nos vamos a cansar de ver por la calle las sandalias romanas en diferentes colores como marrón, negro y colores más llamativos.

LAS SANDALIAS DE FIESTA CON LAS QUE ESTARÁS A LA ÚLTIMAÚltimamente tenemos muchas ganas de salir y disfrutar de los buenos momentos. Y para eso, tenemos una gran variedad de sandalias atadas con las que podrás disfrutar de estos momentos junto a los tuyos. Atrévete con unas sandalias de taconazo. Este año hemos visto en la pasarela que los colores llamativos como lima, rosa, rojo o amarillo están a la última, ¡vamos a meterle color a nuestros looks con unas sandalias de color!Ahora que se acerca el verano y el buen tiempo, tenemos muchas ganas de ponernos unas mules. Un calzado cómodo y versátil con el podrás tanto ir a la oficina como salir a dar una vuelta con tus amigos. En nuestra colección ofrecemos diferentes tipos de mules, con tacón de metacrilato, de vinilo, con materiales acolchados, transparentes… Son un must este verano y… ¡no te puedes quedar sin ellas!

subcategories.name: All
subcategories.description:
Discover the world of women's accessories at Stradivarius, where you'll find everything you need to elevate your outfits and showcase your personality. Our collection is designed to complement your individual style, offering a wide range of options for every occasion. We believe that accessories are the key to unlocking your true fashion potential, and we're here to help you find the perfect pieces to express yourself with confidence. Explore our selection and discover the transformative power of a well-chosen accessory.

Add a touch of sparkle to your everyday look with our stunning range of jewellery. From delicate necklaces and earrings to bold rings and bracelets, our women's jewelry collection offers something for everyone. Whether you prefer classic designs or trendy statement pieces, you'll find the perfect additions to your jewelry box at Stradivarius. Don't miss our selection of charms , perfect for personalizing your favorite bracelets and necklaces.

Complete your outfit with our stylish selection of bags for women. Whether you need a practical tote for everyday errands, a chic clutch for a night out, or a trendy backpack for your adventures, we have the perfect bag to suit your needs. Explore our range of bags and backpacksand find the perfect companion for your daily life. Discover our pursesand choose one that matches with your favorite bag!

Top off your look with our fashionable range of hats and caps. From cozy beanies to stylish fedoras, our collection offers a variety of options to suit every style and occasion. Whether you're looking for sun protection, warmth, or simply a touch of style, you'll find the perfect hat or cap at Stradivarius. Our hats and caps will add a touch of personality to any outfit.

Define your waist and add a touch of style to your outfits with our collection of belts. From classic leather belts to trendy chain belts, our selection offers a variety of options to cinch your waist and elevate your look. Whether you're dressing up a pair of jeans or adding definition to a dress, you'll find the perfect belt at Stradivarius. Our belts are the perfect finishing touch to any outfit.

Accessories are the perfect way to express your unique style and complete your Stradivarius look. With our wide selection of women's jewelry, bags and backpacks, hats and caps, belts, hair accessories, and fashion accessories, you'll find everything you need to complement your looks. Explore our collection today and shop your favorite accessories to give a special touch to your outfits. Whether you're looking for a subtle update or a complete style transformation, Stradivarius has the perfect accessories for you.

subcategories.name: Charms and Pins
subcategories.description:
Charms are the perfect way to add a personal touch to your style, allowing you to express yourself and elevate your accessories. At Stradivarius, we understand the importance of individuality and offer a diverse collection of charms to suit every taste and occasion. Whether you want to adorn your charm bracelet charms, or personalise your bags and backpacks with a trendy bag charm, our selection has something for everyone!

Express Your Individuality with Charms

Charms are a timeless way to showcase your personality. Our collection includes a wide variety of designs, from delicate and minimalist pieces to bold and eye-catching statements. Whether you're into celestial motifs, nature-inspired designs, or quirky symbols, our charms allow you to tell your story in a unique and stylish way. Mix and match different charms to create a personalized charm bracelet charms that reflects your interests and passions.

The Allure of Gold Charms

Gold charms exude timeless elegance and sophistication. Our selection features trendy pieces in various designs, from classic pendants to modern geometric shapes. These charms add a touch of luxury to any outfit and make perfect gifts for loved ones. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply want to treat yourself, our gold charms are a symbol of enduring style and quality.

The Versatility of Silver Charms

If you're drawn to a clean, contemporary look, silver charms are the ideal choice. Their cool-toned finish blends effortlessly with both casual and sophisticated outfits. In our collection, you'll find everything from sleek, minimalist pieces to finely detailed designs that stand out. Whether layered with other jewellery or paired with your favorite belt, silver charms bring a refined edge to your style without overpowering it.

Earring Charms: A Touch of Sparkle

Earring charms are a fun and playful way to elevate your ear jewelry. Our collection features a variety of these pieces, from delicate drops to bold and colourful designs. Add a touch of sparkle to your hoops or studs with our earring charms and create a unique and personalized look. To complete your look, try combining them with hats and caps to enhance the overall vibe, adding a stylish balance between casual and standout accessories.

Bag Charms: Personalise Your Bags

Transform your bags and backpacks with our trendy bag charm collection. These playful accessories add a touch of personality to your favourite bags and allow you to express your style in a unique way. From fun and quirky designs to elegant and sophisticated pieces, our bag charms are the perfect way to make a statement.

Discover the perfect charmsto elevate your style and express your individuality at Stradivarius. Our diverse collection offers endless possibilities for creating personalized looks that reflect your unique personality!

subcategories.name: Bags
subcategories.description:
Discover the perfect blend of style and practicality with our collection of bags and backpacks. Whether you're heading to class, exploring the city, or jetting off on a weekend getaway, our diverse range offers something for every occasion. From chic shoulder bags to functional backpacks, explore the latest trends and find the ideal companion to complement your unique style. 

Explore the versatility of bags

Bags are more than just carriers, they're statements of style. At Stradivarius, we offer a diverse range to match every mood and occasion, so you can find your next favorite accessory. For those who prefer a hands-free option, our backpacks are a must-have, since they combine functionality with fashion-forward designs, perfect for students, commuters, and adventurers alike. If you're after something more compact and elegant, crossbody and mini bags are ideal for everyday errands or evening outings. And for a bold, fashion-forward choice, tote bags and shoppers provide plenty of space without sacrificing style. Whatever your needs, there's a bag and a pair of matching shoes to complete your look and carry your with ease.

Shoulder bags: effortless elegance

For a timeless and sophisticated look, explore our selection of shoulder bags. These versatile bags are perfect for everyday use, offering ample space for your while adding a touch of elegance to your outfit. From classic leather bags to trendy chain-strap designs, these pieces come in a variety of styles to suit your individual taste.

Crossbody bags: hands-free convenience

Stay stylish and organized with our crossbody bags, perfect for those on the go. Our crossbody bags come in a range of sizes and materials, from compact designs ideal for everyday use to larger options that offer extra space for travel.

Tote bags: practical and stylish

For those days when you need to carry a little extra, our tote bags are the perfect solution. When you need to carry more than just the, these maxi bags offer the space and style you desire.

Leather bags: timeless sophistication

Invest in a timeless piece with our collection of leather bags. Crafted from high-quality materials, these bags offer durability and style, making them a worthwhile addition to your wardrobe. Our leather bags come in a range of styles, from classic totes to trendy messenger bags, ensuring you'll find the perfect option to suit your needs.

Choosing the right bag or backpack is for both style and functionality. Consider your daily needs, personal style, and the occasions you'll be using the bag for. Whether you're looking for a practical backpack for everyday use or a chic shoulder bag for a night out, at Stradivarius, we have the perfect option for you!

subcategories.name: Fashion Jewellery
subcategories.description:
Much is spoken about clothing, but accessories don't get as much attention, despite their crucial role in a good look. 

In fashion, a well-chosen accessory can elevate an outfit to new heights or give it an unexpected twist. When it comes to jewellery, timeless pieces never go out of style. However, like all trends, some seasons they take center stage while others they remain more subtle.

Currently, we are experiencing a maximalist era in all things related to earrings, necklaces, rings, bracelets, and other adornments. After seasons where the epitome of fashion was layering many delicate chains, a new horizon of statement pieces emerges. 

In addition to staple pieces like snake chains and links of all sizes, as well as mini hoops and earrings, our collection features items that follow the latest trends. We're talking about retro-inspired elements that bring back shapes, volumes, and gold and silver tones straight from the 80s and 90s. There are also pieces in XXL sizes and bold colors that add joy and a special sparkle to any look. 

Other proposals include transparency, pearls, bows, hearts, or stars: in our jewellery capsules, you'll always find the true must-haves of the moment. Ear cuffs, chokers, necklaces, pendants... In a season where jewellery is so important, don't forget to visit our website to discover how to mix and match them and get the most out of them.

subcategories.name: Hats and caps
subcategories.description:
Step up your style game with the Stradivarius collection of women's hats and caps — the perfect blend of fashion and practicality. From casual baseball caps and cozy beanies to elegant sun hats for women, we’ve got just the thing.

A baseball cap is a staple that goes far beyond the sports field. At Stradivarius, you’ll find everything from timeless classics to statement pieces with unique detailing. Ideal for giving your outfit a relaxed, sporty twist, our caps are great for day-to-day errands or casual meet-ups. It’s all about effortless cool — and we’ve got it in spades.

As temperatures drop, stay snug with one of our warm beanie hats. Whether you're into a close-fitting style or prefer something a little more slouchy, our collection covers it all — from simple knits to trend-led designs featuring pom-poms or textured finishes. A sleek black cap is always a solid option too — understated yet endlessly versatile.

Sunny days call for stylish sun protection. Our range of sun hats for women includes wide brims and natural straw finishes, perfect for holiday moments or adding a sophisticated edge to your everyday wardrobe.

Looking to round off your outfit? Pair your headwear with our curated selection of belts, ideal for cinching your waist or adding a decorative touch to any outfit. Or explore more options in our wide range of accessories, from charms that personalise your look to jewellery that combine style with function.

The right hat or cap does more than finish off an outfit — it reflects your personality. Our women’s headwear comes in a wide array of fabrics and finishes to match your mood or the moment.

At Stradivarius, hats and caps aren’t just seasonal extras — they’re key elements of any well-rounded wardrobe. Explore the latest designs today and find your new go-to accessory.

The charm of a well-chosen hat or cap lies in its ability to add personality and flair to any outfit. Women’s cap come in a variety of styles and materials to suit every taste and occasion. Explore our collection today and discover the perfect caps to complement your unique style. Whether you're a trendsetter or a classicist, Stradivarius has the perfect headwear to complete your look. You can also find a lot of options in the new collection. Our commitment to providing a diverse range of options extends beyond hats and caps. We also offer a wide selection of bags and backpacks, perfect for carrying all your in style. 

In conclusion, hats and caps are accessories that can elevate any outfit. At Stradivarius, we offer a diverse collection of women's hats and caps, from baseball caps to beanies and sun hats, ensuring there's something for every style and occasion. Explore our selection today and discover the perfect finishing touch to express your unique style.

subcategories.name: Sunglasses
subcategories.description:
Sunglasses: The ideal Accessory 

They say the face is the mirror of the soul, so your sunglasses should reflect your personality. At Stradivarius, you’ll find a wide range of styles to elevate your outfits to the next level. 

Choose the ideal Pair for You 

Plastic frames are ideal for everyday wear, with a simple and practical design that complements any look. For a touch of elegance, metal frames are your best ally. Whether round, rectangular, or geometric, choose the shape that best harmonises with your face and achieve a style full of personality. 

If you're after a classic, aviator sunglasses are ideal. This iconic model adds distinction to any outfit. When buying your sunglasses online, trust in the principles of face shape analysis and choose a pair that suits your facial structure. You can't go wrong! 

Timeless Fashion Sunglasses 

Sunglasses are the ideal accessory to complete a look with ease. At Stradivarius, we offer a wide variety of styles for every face shape and personality. Dress your eyes with style. 

Black sunglasses are an unfailing staple to add a chic touch to any outfit. Whether paired with a boho dress or a casual combo of crop top and joggers, this accessory ideal complements your look. For an extra touch of style, try sunglasses with gradient lenses or metallic details. It’s the small details that make all the difference. 

Dare to Go Retro 

If you love retro style, our 60s-inspired sunglasses are an original and sophisticated choice. From square frames to round designs for a boho look, our collection has the ideal accessory for you. 

The Sunglasses That Suit You Best

subcategories.name: Belts
subcategories.description:
Transform Your Look with Stradivarius Belts 
Belts are timeless accessories that accompany us throughout the year, adapting to different styles and occasions. With a simple gesture, you can turn this accessory into your best ally to highlight your figure and enhance your outfits. 

Basic Belts: Pieces 
At Stradivarius, you'll find the perfect belt for every occasion. A basic black belt is a fundamental piece that goes with everything. For a more contemporary touch, opt for a wide belt that stands out in your look. A boho-style belt is ideal for giving a different air to your outfits. 

Trendy Belts: Styles for Every Taste 
Follow the latest trends with our cowboy, raffia, or chain belts. A shirt dress with a wide belt is perfect for casual or office looks. A black or brown belt with a leather effect is a timeless basic. Stand out with a white belt or one with a large buckle. 

Belts That Make You Shine 
For special occasions, choose a shiny or metallic belt that complements your party dresses. A wide belt over a classic shirt creates a flattering corset effect. A golden or silver belt will make you shine in the night. 

A Belt for Every Style 
At Stradivarius, we have belts for every style. A fajin belt highlights your figure and pairs perfectly with coats. A boho belt complements patterned dresses and high boots. A buckle belt adds an urban touch to cowboy looks. Studded belts are ideal for styles with character. 

Belts in Fashionable Textures
Discover our wide variety of belts in different textures: crocodile effect, vintage chains, transparent, raffia, adorned with gemstones... Find the one that best suits your style! Refresh Your Wardrobe with Stradivarius 

Don't underestimate the power of a belt to transform your looks. At Stradivarius, you'll find the perfect belt to accentuate your waist, give your garments a different touch, and turn a simple outfit into one full of style.

subcategories.name: Hair accessories
subcategories.description:
Complete your Stradivarius look with our curated selection of hair accessories, perfect for adding a personal touch to any outfit. Whether you’re looking to keep your hair in place during a workout, add a subtle sparkle, or elevate your everyday style, you’ll find versatile options that suit every occasion.

Discover the latest trends in hair accessories for women, where practicality meets fashion. Our pieces are designed to reflect your individuality while ensuring durability and comfort. From minimalist designs to bold statements, explore a collection that celebrates both style and quality!

Hair Clips: A touch of sparkle

Add a touch of sparkle with our range of hair clips. From delicate designs with pearls and rhinestones to bold and colourful statement pieces, our hair clips are the perfect way to add a touch of glamour to any hairstyle. In our collection you can choose from a variety of sizes, shapes, and materials to find the perfect match for your personal aesthetic. And if you love customising your look even further, don’t miss our playful bag charms, perfect for adding that same personal touch to your favourite accessories.

Headbands: Comfort and Style

Keep your hair in place and add a touch of style with our collection of headbands. From sporty options for workouts to chic and fashionable designs for everyday wear, we have a headband for every occasion. They are designed for comfort and durability, ensuring a secure and comfortable fit all day long. For even more styling possibilities, try incorporating scarves, whether tied around your ponytail, worn as a head wrap, or styled as a hairband, scarves offer endless ways to create fun and original looks that will elevate your outfit.

Hats and Caps: Fashion Meets Function

Add personality to your outfit while staying protected from the sun with our variety ofhats and caps. Whether you go for a casual baseball cap, a trendy bucket hat, or a wide-brimmed option for a more elevated look, these pieces are designed to offer both style and practicality. For a complete and eye-catching look, pair them with our range of sunglasses, perfect for adding a bold statement while shielding your eyes.

Scrunchies: The perfect retro accessory

Bring back a touch of nostalgia with our collection ofscrunchies. These soft and stylish hair ties are gentle on your hair and offer a comfortable and secure hold. Perfect for creating effortless ponytails, buns, or braids, our scrunchies come in a variety of colours, patterns, and fabrics to match your personal style. Add a pop of colour to your everyday look or choose a luxurious velvet scrunchie for a special occasion.

We are constantly adding new styles and designs to our collection of hair accessories, so be sure to check back often to discover the latest trends in hair accessories for women. From everyday to statement pieces, our selection is always evolving to match your mood, the season, and the latest fashion movements. We are excited to be a part of your style journey and help you create looks that are uniquely you!

subcategories.name: Fragrances
subcategories.description:
Fragrances and aromatic candles that leave a mark

Perfumes are much more than a blend of scents; they are personal expressions that linger in memory. At Stradivarius, we want to help you find the essence that best identifies with you. From fresh and subtle to sweet and enduring, our collection invites you to discover your unique olfactory signature. 
For those who prefer freshness and vitality, our selection of fresh colognes for women offers a variety that fits your everyday life. Find the scent that complements your personality and lifestyle, offering confidence and energy with each application. And who doesn't enjoy a tranquil environment imbued with their favorite aroma? Light one of our aromatic candles and immerse yourself in its special fragrance for a total relaxation experience. 

Fragrances that sweeten your day 

Our fragrances exhale an intense and unique aroma, capable of enveloping you like your favorite dessert. With our eau de toilette, each application is a perfect finishing touch for any occasion, infusing a vibrant harmony of nuances that delight the senses and enhance your security and personality. Experience an addictive and sweet touch with our vanilla cologne, enigmatic for its distinctive sweetness that leaves an unmistakable trail wherever you go. For those who love the sensual perfume of coconut, our enveloping fragrance combines stimulating freshness and warm aromas, transporting you to paradisiacal beaches and endless summers. 

Fresh colognes with a clean scent 

The compliment ""You smell so good!"" is always well received, especially with our fresh colognes for women that offer a subtle and elegant trail with energizing citrus notes. Evoking walks through the Mediterranean, our colognes with bergamot transport you to Italian lemon orchards with their velvety aroma. Floral notes like the classic scent of roses or the charming jasmine, each with its uniqueness and freshness, capture the essence of femininity and love. 

Unique and irresistible fragrances 

There are fragrances that mark unforgettable moments. Our intense and original eau de toilette are designed for those special occasions that demand distinction and elegance. Perfect for parties and celebratory nights, these oriental and woody fragrances with cedar, sandalwood, and patchouli combine warmth and sensuality with a lasting intensity that suits your style. 

Aromatic candles for your home 

Transform your space into an oasis of peace and sophistication with our exceptional aromatic candles, designed to enhance your emotional well-being with their gentle essences. At Stradivarius, we care not only about your appearance but also about how you feel at home. 
Choose from our variety of aromatic candles to create a warm and romantic atmosphere that envelops you with its enduring refinement. With these options, each Stradivarius product invites you to discover and share your unique essence with the world.

subcategories.name: Charms and Pins
subcategories.description:
Charms are the perfect way to add a personal touch to your style, allowing you to express yourself and elevate your accessories. At Stradivarius, we understand the importance of individuality and offer a diverse collection of charms to suit every taste and occasion. Whether you want to adorn your charm bracelet charms, or personalise your bags and backpacks with a trendy bag charm, our selection has something for everyone!

Express Your Individuality with Charms

Charms are a timeless way to showcase your personality. Our collection includes a wide variety of designs, from delicate and minimalist pieces to bold and eye-catching statements. Whether you're into celestial motifs, nature-inspired designs, or quirky symbols, our charms allow you to tell your story in a unique and stylish way. Mix and match different charms to create a personalized charm bracelet charms that reflects your interests and passions.

The Allure of Gold Charms

Gold charms exude timeless elegance and sophistication. Our selection features trendy pieces in various designs, from classic pendants to modern geometric shapes. These charms add a touch of luxury to any outfit and make perfect gifts for loved ones. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply want to treat yourself, our gold charms are a symbol of enduring style and quality.

The Versatility of Silver Charms

If you're drawn to a clean, contemporary look, silver charms are the ideal choice. Their cool-toned finish blends effortlessly with both casual and sophisticated outfits. In our collection, you'll find everything from sleek, minimalist pieces to finely detailed designs that stand out. Whether layered with other jewellery or paired with your favorite belt, silver charms bring a refined edge to your style without overpowering it.

Earring Charms: A Touch of Sparkle

Earring charms are a fun and playful way to elevate your ear jewelry. Our collection features a variety of these pieces, from delicate drops to bold and colourful designs. Add a touch of sparkle to your hoops or studs with our earring charms and create a unique and personalized look. To complete your look, try combining them with hats and caps to enhance the overall vibe, adding a stylish balance between casual and standout accessories.

Bag Charms: Personalise Your Bags

Transform your bags and backpacks with our trendy bag charm collection. These playful accessories add a touch of personality to your favourite bags and allow you to express your style in a unique way. From fun and quirky designs to elegant and sophisticated pieces, our bag charms are the perfect way to make a statement.

Discover the perfect charmsto elevate your style and express your individuality at Stradivarius. Our diverse collection offers endless possibilities for creating personalized looks that reflect your unique personality!

subcategories.name: Fashion Jewellery
subcategories.description:
Much is spoken about clothing, but accessories don't get as much attention, despite their crucial role in a good look. 

In fashion, a well-chosen accessory can elevate an outfit to new heights or give it an unexpected twist. When it comes to jewellery, timeless pieces never go out of style. However, like all trends, some seasons they take center stage while others they remain more subtle.

Currently, we are experiencing a maximalist era in all things related to earrings, necklaces, rings, bracelets, and other adornments. After seasons where the epitome of fashion was layering many delicate chains, a new horizon of statement pieces emerges. 

In addition to staple pieces like snake chains and links of all sizes, as well as mini hoops and earrings, our collection features items that follow the latest trends. We're talking about retro-inspired elements that bring back shapes, volumes, and gold and silver tones straight from the 80s and 90s. There are also pieces in XXL sizes and bold colors that add joy and a special sparkle to any look. 

Other proposals include transparency, pearls, bows, hearts, or stars: in our jewellery capsules, you'll always find the true must-haves of the moment. Ear cuffs, chokers, necklaces, pendants... In a season where jewellery is so important, don't forget to visit our website to discover how to mix and match them and get the most out of them.

subcategories.name: Necklaces
subcategories.description:
Elevate your style with our stunning collection of necklaces. From delicate chains to statement pieces, find the perfect necklace to express your unique personality. Discover our range of designs, crafted with attention to detail and current trends, ensuring you always have the perfect accessory for any occasion. Our jewellery pieces are designed to add a touch of sparkle and sophistication to every outfit, making you feel confident and stylish.

Timeless Elegance: The Pearl Necklace
A classic choice that never goes out of style, the pearl necklace adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit. At Stradivarius, we offer a modern take on this iconic piece, with delicate pearl strands and contemporary designs that blend seamlessly with current trends. Perfect for both formal occasions and adding a touch of elegance to your everyday look.

Shine Bright: The Gold Necklace
Add a touch of glamour to your look with a stunning gold necklace. Our collection features a variety of styles, from delicate gold chains that bring effortless elegance to bold statement pieces that instantly elevate your outfit. Whether you prefer a minimalist design for everyday wear or something more elaborate for special occasions, gold necklaces are timeless staples that never go out of style. Pair them with matching earrings or rings to create a cohesive and radiant look.

Express Yourself: Pendant Necklace
The pendant necklace is a fantastic way to showcase your individuality. We offer a wide array of pendant necklaces, from dainty charms to bold, eye-catching designs that speak to your personality. Whether you’re drawn to simple geometric shapes, meaningful symbols, initials, or sparkling gemstones, there’s a piece to match every mood and message. Subtle Sophistication: The Silver Chain

seoCategory.name: Fashion Jewellery
seoCategory.title: Women’s fashion jewellery | Stradivarius {0}
seoCategory.metaDescription: FREE STORE SHIPPING | Discover our incredible collection of {1} on Stradivarius. Find the latest styles and fashion trends in dresses, pants and much more.
seoCategory.longDescription:
Much is spoken about clothing, but accessories don't get as much attention, despite their crucial role in a good look. 

In fashion, a well-chosen accessory can elevate an outfit to new heights or give it an unexpected twist. When it comes to jewellery, timeless pieces never go out of style. However, like all trends, some seasons they take center stage while others they remain more subtle.

Currently, we are experiencing a maximalist era in all things related to earrings, necklaces, rings, bracelets, and other adornments. After seasons where the epitome of fashion was layering many delicate chains, a new horizon of statement pieces emerges. 

In addition to staple pieces like snake chains and links of all sizes, as well as mini hoops and earrings, our collection features items that follow the latest trends. We're talking about retro-inspired elements that bring back shapes, volumes, and gold and silver tones straight from the 80s and 90s. There are also pieces in XXL sizes and bold colors that add joy and a special sparkle to any look. 

Other proposals include transparency, pearls, bows, hearts, or stars: in our jewellery capsules, you'll always find the true must-haves of the moment. Ear cuffs, chokers, necklaces, pendants... In a season where jewellery is so important, don't forget to visit our website to discover how to mix and match them and get the most out of them.

subcategories.name: Hair Accessories
subcategories.description:
Stradivarius Accessories for a Perfect Look

At Stradivarius, we know that details like a hat, a matching bag, or statement earrings can make all the difference. That's why we offer a wide selection of accessories: you'll find handbags, backpacks, purses, and wallets for women so you always have everything you need.

Add a different touch to your look by choosing the right belt; we have basics that go with everything and others that are more special for unique occasions. Don't compromise your style in cold weather: scarves and shawls to keep your neck warm are ideal for adding an elegant touch to your look.

From essential accessories to irresistible little details, we have the most captivating jewelry pieces.

In our accessories section, utility is combined with vibrant colors and special details. Cosmetic bags and cases are more than just accessories, they're life companions! Enjoy the beauty of the little things, starting with everyday accessories.

Backpacks are essential for carrying everything. If you prefer handbags, we have options in all sizes, from shoppers for carrying your laptop to small bags for going out with friends. Bum bags, perfect for concerts or parties, add an urban touch and are perfect for those who only carry the essentials.

Our variety of women's wallets and purses is extensive, from small coin purses to wallets with enough space to carry everything you need.

Accessories That Will Transform Your Looks

You have the perfect combination of clothing and the ideal bag, but sometimes something is missing. At Stradivarius, we believe in the power of a good belt. Find the ideal belt to match or contrast with your trousers, skirts, or dresses.

We're fans of scarves and the multiple ways to wear them: around the neck, on the head as a bandana, or bow to give your hairstyle a different touch. Nothing like a set of pendants to add fun or distinction to your look. Mix necklaces, bracelets, ankle bracelets; the possibilities are endless.

Hair Accessories: The Cherry on Top of Your Looks

A hair accessory that fits your style can be as prominent as any other garment. Enhance the beauty of your hair with headbands, scarves, and hair clips; a simple and original way to complete your look.

subcategories.name: Bags
subcategories.description:
Looking for the perfect accessory to complete your urban style? At Stradivarius, we understand that bagsandbackpacks are more than just practical items, they're fashion statements. Whether you're hitting the city streets or heading to class, we've got the ideal companions to carry your !

Our collection of bags and backpacks is designed for the modern woman who values both style and functionality. We offer a diverse selection of styles to suit every occasion: from sleek crossbody bags perfect for a night out, to roomy totes ideal for a busy day at work or university.

Handbags for women are a classic choice, perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any look. From structured black bags to slouchy, we have a variety of shapes and sizes. For everyday wear, you can’t go wrong with a stylish shoulder bag, but you can also explore crossbody styles for added convenience or roomy bucket bags for a modern twist. Whatever your routine, there's a perfect handbag waiting to complement your outfit!

A crossover bag, is an excellent option when you need to keep your belongings close and secure. Whether you're exploring a new city or running errands, this bag offers freedom of movement and peace of mind while still looking chic. However, if you're in need of more space, a tote bag is your best bet. These roomy bags are ideal for carrying everything you need, from laptops to snacks and extra layers, making them perfect for work, school, or a long day out.

When you're looking to travel light without sacrificing style, a mini bag is the way to go. Compact yet eye-catching, it's perfect for carrying just the , while adding a refined, trendy touch to your look. Whether you're heading out for the evening or simply want a sleek accessory for daytime plans, a mini bag offers the ideal balance of practicality and fashion-forward design.

For those who prefer a hands-free option, our backpacks for women are the perfect solution. A leather backpack combines durability with a touch of sophistication. If you're after something more casual, opt for a canvas backpack, since it is lightweight and perfect for everyday wear. Whether you're carrying books, a laptop, or just your everyday , our backpacks are designed to keep you organized and stylish.

Accessorize your bags and backpacks with our fun and stylish charms! These small details can make a big difference, allowing you to express your personality and switch up your style with ease. Whether you want to add a pop of color or a touch of sparkle, our charms are the perfect way to customize your look and make your everyday bag feel brand new.

At Stradivarius, we believe that your accessories should reflect your personality. That's why we offer a wide range of bags and backpacks for women to choose from. Whether you're looking for a classic black bag or a more trendy style, we've got you covered.

subcategories.name: Mini
subcategories.description:
Mini bags are the ultimate statement piece for fashion-forward individuals. They combine style and practicality in a compact design. Unlike maxi bags, which prioritize storage, mini bags focus on elevating your look with minimal bulk. At Stradivarius, we offer a curated collection of these bags that are perfect for adding a touch of chic to any outfit. Discover our selection of bags and backpacks to complement your style. Whether you're heading to a party or running errands, our mini bags are the perfect companion! 

The versatility of mini bags

Mini bags are incredibly versatile, seamlessly transitioning from day to night. During the day, pair a mini bag with a midi dress for a casual yet stylish look. In the evening, elevate your outfit with a chic mini bag for a night out. The possibilities are endless! 

Styling tips for mini bags

Styling a mini bag is all about balancing proportions and creating a cohesive look. For a casual daytime outfit, pair a mini messenger bag with jeans and a t-shirt. Add a pop of color with a brightly colored mini bag to elevate your look. In the evening, opt for a sleek mini clutch or a shoulder bag to complement your dress or jumpsuit. Consider the color and embellishments of your mini bag to ensure it complements your outfit!

Mini bags as a statement piece

Mini bags are more than just a practical accessory; they are a statement piece that can elevate any outfit. Style it with confidence and let your mini bag be the focal point of your look. We have different styles of bags and backpacks to choose from.

Small ladies' backpack: the practical and stylish choice

For those who value convenience and style, a mini backpack is an excellent option. The small ladies’ backpacks are designed to be compact and lightweight while still offering enough space for your essentials. They are perfect for everyday use, whether you're commuting to work or exploring a new city.

Small Purses for Women: The elegant choice

A small purse is a classic and elegant accessory that can elevate any outfit. These purses are perfect for special occasions or when you want to travel light. Look for designs with metallic details, chain straps, or textured finishes that add a refined touch.

Discover the perfect mini bag at Stradivarius to elevate your style and express your individuality. Our collection offers a wide range of options, from practical small backpacks for women to elegant small purses for women, ensuring that you find the perfect accessory for every occasion. Visit our website or store today to explore our mini bag collection and find your new favorite accessory.

Mini bags are the ultimate statement piece for fashion-forward individuals. They combine style and practicality in a compact design. Unlike maxi bags, which prioritize storage, mini bags focus on elevating your look with minimal bulk. At Stradivarius, we offer a curated collection of these bags that are perfect for adding a touch of chic to any outfit. Discover our selection of bags and backpacks to complement your style. Whether you're heading to a party or running errands, our mini bags are the perfect companion! 

The versatility of mini bags

Mini bags are incredibly versatile, seamlessly transitioning from day to night. During the day, pair a mini bag with a midi dress for a casual yet stylish look. In the evening, elevate your outfit with a chic mini bag for a night out. The possibilities are endless! 

Styling tips for mini bags

Styling a mini bag is all about balancing proportions and creating a cohesive look. For a casual daytime outfit, pair a mini messenger bag with jeans and a t-shirt. Add a pop of color with a brightly colored mini bag to elevate your look. In the evening, opt for a sleek mini clutch or a shoulder bag to complement your dress or jumpsuit. Consider the color and embellishments of your mini bag to ensure it complements your outfit!

Mini bags as a statement piece

Mini bags are more than just a practical accessory; they are a statement piece that can elevate any outfit. Style it with confidence and let your mini bag be the focal point of your look. We have different styles of bags and backpacks to choose from.

Small ladies' backpack: the practical and stylish choice

For those who value convenience and style, a mini backpack is an excellent option. The small ladies’ backpacks are designed to be compact and lightweight while still offering enough space for your essentials. They are perfect for everyday use, whether you're commuting to work or exploring a new city.

Small Purses for Women: The elegant choice

A small purse is a classic and elegant accessory that can elevate any outfit. These purses are perfect for special occasions or when you want to travel light. Look for designs with metallic details, chain straps, or textured finishes that add a refined touch.

Discover the perfect mini bag at Stradivarius to elevate your style and express your individuality. Our collection offers a wide range of options, from practical small backpacks for women to elegant small purses for women, ensuring that you find the perfect accessory for every occasion. Visit our website or store today to explore our mini bag collection and find your new favorite accessory.

subcategories.name: Backpacks
subcategories.description:
Looking for the perfect everyday companion? Our collection of backpacks at Stradivarius offers stylish and functional options to suit every taste and need. Whether you're heading to class, exploring the city, or embarking on a weekend adventure, we have the ideal backpacks to carry your essentials in style.

Discover the perfect blend of fashion and functionality with our extensive range of girls’ backpacks. From sleek and minimalist designs to trendy and eye-catching styles. Our backpacks are crafted from high-quality materials to ensure durability and longevity.

Looking for a classic and versatile option? A black backpack is a timeless choice that complements any outfit. These backpacks are perfect for everyday use, offering ample storage space and a sleek, understated look.

If you prefer a more unique and playful style, a pink backpack is sure to catch your eye. These vibrant backpacks add a pop of color to your ensemble and are perfect for expressing your personality.

For those who prioritize practicality and visibility, a clear backpack is a great choice. These backpacks allow you to easily see your belongings, making them ideal for school, work, or events where security is a concern.

Need a backpack that can withstand the elements? A waterproof backpack is designed to keep your belongings safe and dry, no matter the weather. These backpacks are perfect for outdoor activities, travel, or daily commutes in unpredictable conditions.

Our leather backpacks exude sophistication and elegance, making them the perfect choice for elevating your everyday style. Whether you're heading to work, class, or a weekend outing, these backpacks offer a polished look without sacrificing practicality. To make your backpack truly your own, try decorating it with one of our fun and stylish bagcharms. From playful keychains to elegant tassels, these accessories let you add a unique touch to a timeless piece.

Searching for the best item for your next trip? Our ladies' travel backpack selection offers spacious compartments, comfortable straps, and durable construction to ensure a smooth and enjoyable travel experience.

When it comes to busy workdays, a good work backpack is essential. In our selection, you can find pieces that are crafted to fit your laptop and daily must-haves, all while offering a sleek and professional finish that suits any office-ready outfit.

And while backpacks offer unbeatable convenience and style, sometimes you might want to switch things up with other bag options. For a more refined look, consider a classic purse or a shoulder bag, both perfect for adding a touch of elegance to your outfit. If you prefer something compact and trendy, a mini bag is ideal for carrying just the necessities. And when you need hands-free practicality combined with secure storage, a crossover bag strikes the perfect balance, especially for busy days.

At Stradivarius, we believe that a backpack is more than just a bag, it's an extension of your personal style. That's why we offer a wide variety of designs, colors, and materials to help you find the best backpack to express your individuality.

Looking for the perfect accessory to complete your urban style? At Stradivarius, we understand that bagsandbackpacks are more than just practical items, they're fashion statements. Whether you're hitting the city streets or heading to class, we've got the ideal companions to carry your !

Our collection of bags and backpacks is designed for the modern woman who values both style and functionality. We offer a diverse selection of styles to suit every occasion: from sleek crossbody bags perfect for a night out, to roomy totes ideal for a busy day at work or university.

Handbags for women are a classic choice, perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any look. From structured black bags to slouchy, we have a variety of shapes and sizes. For everyday wear, you can’t go wrong with a stylish shoulder bag, but you can also explore crossbody styles for added convenience or roomy bucket bags for a modern twist. Whatever your routine, there's a perfect handbag waiting to complement your outfit!

A crossover bag, is an excellent option when you need to keep your belongings close and secure. Whether you're exploring a new city or running errands, this bag offers freedom of movement and peace of mind while still looking chic. However, if you're in need of more space, a tote bag is your best bet. These roomy bags are ideal for carrying everything you need, from laptops to snacks and extra layers, making them perfect for work, school, or a long day out.

When you're looking to travel light without sacrificing style, a mini bag is the way to go. Compact yet eye-catching, it's perfect for carrying just the , while adding a refined, trendy touch to your look. Whether you're heading out for the evening or simply want a sleek accessory for daytime plans, a mini bag offers the ideal balance of practicality and fashion-forward design.

For those who prefer a hands-free option, our backpacks for women are the perfect solution. A leather backpack combines durability with a touch of sophistication. If you're after something more casual, opt for a canvas backpack, since it is lightweight and perfect for everyday wear. Whether you're carrying books, a laptop, or just your everyday , our backpacks are designed to keep you organized and stylish.

Accessorize your bags and backpacks with our fun and stylish charms! These small details can make a big difference, allowing you to express your personality and switch up your style with ease. Whether you want to add a pop of color or a touch of sparkle, our charms are the perfect way to customize your look and make your everyday bag feel brand new.

At Stradivarius, we believe that your accessories should reflect your personality. That's why we offer a wide range of bags and backpacks for women to choose from. Whether you're looking for a classic black bag or a more trendy style, we've got you covered.

subcategories.name: Fragrances
subcategories.description:
Fragrances and aromatic candles that leave a mark

Perfumes are much more than a blend of scents; they are personal expressions that linger in memory. At Stradivarius, we want to help you find the essence that best identifies with you. From fresh and subtle to sweet and enduring, our collection invites you to discover your unique olfactory signature. 
For those who prefer freshness and vitality, our selection of fresh colognes for women offers a variety that fits your everyday life. Find the scent that complements your personality and lifestyle, offering confidence and energy with each application. And who doesn't enjoy a tranquil environment imbued with their favorite aroma? Light one of our aromatic candles and immerse yourself in its special fragrance for a total relaxation experience. 

Fragrances that sweeten your day 

Our fragrances exhale an intense and unique aroma, capable of enveloping you like your favorite dessert. With our eau de toilette, each application is a ideal finishing touch for any occasion, infusing a vibrant harmony of nuances that delight the senses and enhance your security and personality. Experience an addictive and sweet touch with our vanilla cologne, enigmatic for its distinctive sweetness that leaves an unmistakable trail wherever you go. For those who love the sensual perfume of coconut, our enveloping fragrance combines stimulating freshness and warm aromas, transporting you to paradisiacal beaches and endless summers. 

Fresh colognes with a clean scent 

The compliment ""You smell so good!"" is always well received, especially with our fresh colognes for women that offer a subtle and elegant trail with energizing citrus notes. Evoking walks through the Mediterranean, our colognes with bergamot transport you to Italian lemon orchards with their velvety aroma. Floral notes like the classic scent of roses or the charming jasmine, each with its uniqueness and freshness, capture the essence of femininity and love. 

Unique and irresistible fragrances 

There are fragrances that mark unforgettable moments. Our intense and original eau de toilette are designed for those special occasions that demand distinction and elegance. Ideal for parties and celebratory nights, these oriental and woody fragrances with cedar, sandalwood, and patchouli combine warmth and sensuality with a lasting intensity that suits your style. 

Aromatic candles for your home 

Transform your space into an oasis of peace and sophistication with our exceptional aromatic candles, designed to enhance your emotional well-being with their gentle essences. At Stradivarius, we care not only about your appearance but also about how you feel at home. 
Choose from our variety of aromatic candles to create a warm and romantic atmosphere that envelops you with its enduring refinement. With these options, each Stradivarius product invites you to discover and share your unique essence with the world.

subcategories.name: Sunglasses
subcategories.description:
Sunglasses: The ideal Accessory 

They say the face is the mirror of the soul, so your sunglasses should reflect your personality. At Stradivarius, you’ll find a wide range of styles to elevate your outfits to the next level. 

Choose the ideal Pair for You 

Plastic frames are ideal for everyday wear, with a simple and practical design that complements any look. For a touch of elegance, metal frames are your best ally. Whether round, rectangular, or geometric, choose the shape that best harmonises with your face and achieve a style full of personality. 

If you're after a classic, aviator sunglasses are ideal. This iconic model adds distinction to any outfit. When buying your sunglasses online, trust in the principles of face shape analysis and choose a pair that suits your facial structure. You can't go wrong! 

Timeless Fashion Sunglasses 

Sunglasses are the ideal accessory to complete a look with ease. At Stradivarius, we offer a wide variety of styles for every face shape and personality. Dress your eyes with style. 

Black sunglasses are an unfailing staple to add a chic touch to any outfit. Whether paired with a boho dress or a casual combo of crop top and joggers, this accessory ideally complements your look. For an extra touch of style, try sunglasses with gradient lenses or metallic details. It’s the small details that make all the difference. 

Dare to Go Retro 

If you love retro style, our 60s-inspired sunglasses are an original and sophisticated choice. From square frames to round designs for a boho look, our collection has the ideal accessory for you. 

The Sunglasses That Suit You Best 

For a minimalist style, metal sunglasses are the ideal option. Classic aviators or unique geometric shapes, they all adapt to any look. Whether hexagonal or oval, at Stradivarius, we have the ideal pair to enhance your style. Get ready to turn heads!

subcategories.name: Belts
subcategories.description:
Transform Your Look with Stradivarius Belts 
Belts are timeless accessories that accompany us throughout the year, adapting to different styles and occasions. With a simple gesture, you can turn this accessory into your best ally to highlight your figure and enhance your outfits. 

Basic Belts: Essential Pieces 
At Stradivarius, you'll find the perfect belt for every occasion. A basic black belt is a fundamental piece that goes with everything. For a more contemporary touch, opt for a wide belt that stands out in your look. A boho-style belt is ideal for giving a different air to your outfits. 

Trendy Belts: Styles for Every Taste 
Follow the latest trends with our cowboy, raffia, or chain belts. A shirt dress with a wide belt is perfect for casual or office looks. A black or brown belt with a leather effect is a timeless basic. Stand out with a white belt or one with a large buckle. 

Belts That Make You Shine 
For special occasions, choose a shiny or metallic belt that complements your party dresses. A wide belt over a classic shirt creates a flattering corset effect. A golden or silver belt will make you shine in the night. 

A Belt for Every Style 
At Stradivarius, we have belts for every style. A fajin belt highlights your figure and pairs perfectly with coats. A boho belt complements patterned dresses and high boots. A buckle belt adds an urban touch to cowboy looks. Studded belts are ideal for styles with character. 

Belts in Fashionable Textures
Discover our wide variety of belts in different textures: crocodile effect, vintage chains, transparent, raffia, adorned with gemstones... Find the one that best suits your style! Refresh Your Wardrobe with Stradivarius 

Don't underestimate the power of a belt to transform your looks. At Stradivarius, you'll find the perfect belt to accentuate your waist, give your garments a different touch, and turn a simple outfit into one full of style.

subcategories.name: Wallets and Purses
subcategories.description:
Women's Wallets: A Secure Investment 
Keep everything under control with Stradivarius women's wallets The important part is on the inside, and when it comes to women's wallets, this is absolutely true. Although not as visible as handbags, wallets are essential for securely and stylishly storing cards and bills. Our collection includes basic wallets, billfolds, and cardholders that you'll love. 

Wallets you can always rely on 
Stradivarius wallets are perfect for any occasion. Whether for casual situations or formal events, our wallets keep your essentials safe and secure. Basic and versatile designs are key, and our fashion experts agree that simplicity is best. A zippered wallet is both functional and stylish, looking great whether in a party clutch or your daily backpack. 

Basic wallets that go with everything 
A good wallet should be beautiful, match your accessories, and be suitable for any situation. Monochrome wallets are a safe bet. Choose from classic tones like black, white, cream, and dark blue, or opt for bold colors like red. A pink wallet is vibrant and goes with everything. Plain-colored wallets are ideal for those who prefer minimalist designs. 

Printed wallets: A whim or a necessity? 
For those who prefer a stylish wallet, prints are an excellent choice. Our selection offers various options of prints and textures. It doesn't always need to match your outfit; what matters is that you like it. When paying, show your most original side with a printed wallet from Stradivarius. 

Wallets designed for you 
Not all women's wallets have the same functionality. Many people prefer paying with cards, a mobile phone, or smartwatch. For them, a cardholder wallet is ideal, organizing not only bank cards but also transport and loyalty cards. For those who prefer paying with their phone, a smartphone wallet case is perfect. 

For those who still prefer traditional methods of payment, our collection includes basic wallets and coin purses. And for those who like to be prepared for anything, a cardholder wallet with space for cards, coins, and bills ensures you're always ready.
