subcategories.name: Hats and caps
subcategories.description:
Women’s Hats and Beanies: The Ideal Finishing Touch 

Women’s hats and beanies are the ideal finishing touch for all types of outfits, not just casual looks. Remember: beanies aren’t just for keeping warm, and caps aren’t exclusive to sports. 

Both classic hats and trendy caps can add style and distinction to your most special outfits. To combat the cold, a knitted beanie is a must-have. This versatile accessory is easy to pair with various looks, providing warmth and a stylish detail that enhances your layers. 

At Stradivarius, we believe a beanie and scarf set in your favourite colour can become your go-to duo for the season. Grab your coat, wrap up in your scarf, and pop on that beanie for a warm and well-coordinated look. 

When it comes to elevating an outfit, the fedora is the ideal accessory to add a chic and mysterious touch. Similarly, the sailor cap and berets are elegant and popular choices. In streetwear fashion, the bucket hat is a must-have. Pair it with dungarees, a cropped tee, and trainers for a comfortable yet stylish look. 

Casual Caps and Essentials 

Black caps, whether plain or embroidered, are ideal for giving your outfits a laid-back vibe. For a modern twist, opt for a cap with a leather effect; you'll be right on trend and make a standout impression. 

Don’t let the cold escape through your head. Add warmth and style to your outfits with a knitted beanie, with or without a pompom. Beanies are also a casual choice packed with personality. With reversible beanies, you don’t have to commit to just one colour or pattern. Choose the finish that suits you best each day. 

Complete Your Style from Head to Toe 

Stradivarius berets, in addition to the classics, include updated options such as leather effects, crystal details, and even knitted berets. 

Bucket hats, or fisher hats, have been a popular choice in recent years. These fashionable hats will give a contemporary touch to all your outfits. Choose between floral prints or solid colours with the reversible format to have the best of both worlds. 

Caps for the Ideal Sporty Look 

For outdoor activities, make sure you have comfortable trainers or leggings that offer freedom of movement, but don’t forget head protection. 

Sports caps not only protect you while engaging in your favourite sport but also add a sporty touch to any look. The classic black cap is reinvented in various fabrics and colours. Update your sporty style with a nylon cap, a modern choice that combines lightness, protection, and style.

Both classic hats and trendy caps can add style and distinction to your most special outfits. To combat the cold, a knitted beanie is a must-have. This versatile accessory is easy to pair with various looks, providing warmth and a stylish detail that enhances your layers. 

At Stradivarius, we believe a beanie and scarf set in your favourite colour can become your go-to duo for the season. Grab your coat, wrap up in your scarf, and pop on that beanie for a warm and well-coordinated look. 

When it comes to elevating an outfit, the fedora is the ideal accessory to add a chic and mysterious touch. Similarly, the sailor cap and berets are elegant and popular choices. In streetwear fashion, the bucket hat is a must-have. Pair it with dungarees, a cropped tee, and trainers for a comfortable yet stylish look. 

Casual Caps and Essentials 

Black caps, whether plain or embroidered, are ideal for giving your outfits a laid-back vibe. For a modern twist, opt for a cap with a leather effect; you'll be right on trend and make a standout impression. 

Don’t let the cold escape through your head. Add warmth and style to your outfits with a knitted beanie, with or without a pompom. Beanies are also a casual choice packed with personality. With reversible beanies, you don’t have to commit to just one colour or pattern. Choose the finish that suits you best each day. 

Complete Your Style from Head to Toe 

Stradivarius berets, in addition to the classics, include updated options such as leather effects, crystal details, and even knitted berets. 

Bucket hats, or fisher hats, have been a popular choice in recent years. These fashionable hats will give a contemporary touch to all your outfits. Choose between floral prints or solid colours with the reversible format to have the best of both worlds. 

Caps for the Ideal Sporty Look 

For outdoor activities, make sure you have comfortable trainers or leggings that offer freedom of movement, but don’t forget head protection. 

Sports caps not only protect you while engaging in your favourite sport but also add a sporty touch to any look. The classic black cap is reinvented in various fabrics and colours. Update your sporty style with a nylon cap, a modern choice that combines lightness, protection, and style.

subcategories.name: Bags
subcategories.description:
Looking for the perfect accessory to complete your urban style? At Stradivarius, we understand that bagsandbackpacks are more than just practical items, they're fashion statements. Whether you're hitting the city streets or heading to class, we've got the ideal companions to carry your !

Our collection of bags and backpacks is designed for the modern woman who values both style and functionality. We offer a diverse selection of styles to suit every occasion: from sleek crossbody bags perfect for a night out, to roomy totes ideal for a busy day at work or university.

Handbags for women are a classic choice, perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any look. From structured black bags to slouchy, we have a variety of shapes and sizes. For everyday wear, you can’t go wrong with a stylish shoulder bag, but you can also explore crossbody styles for added convenience or roomy bucket bags for a modern twist. Whatever your routine, there's a perfect handbag waiting to complement your outfit!

A crossover bag, is an excellent option when you need to keep your belongings close and secure. Whether you're exploring a new city or running errands, this bag offers freedom of movement and peace of mind while still looking chic. However, if you're in need of more space, a tote bag is your best bet. These roomy bags are ideal for carrying everything you need, from laptops to snacks and extra layers, making them perfect for work, school, or a long day out.

When you're looking to travel light without sacrificing style, a mini bag is the way to go. Compact yet eye-catching, it's perfect for carrying just the , while adding a refined, trendy touch to your look. Whether you're heading out for the evening or simply want a sleek accessory for daytime plans, a mini bag offers the ideal balance of practicality and fashion-forward design.

For those who prefer a hands-free option, our backpacks for women are the perfect solution. A leather backpack combines durability with a touch of sophistication. If you're after something more casual, opt for a canvas backpack, since it is lightweight and perfect for everyday wear. Whether you're carrying books, a laptop, or just your everyday , our backpacks are designed to keep you organized and stylish.

Accessorize your bags and backpacks with our fun and stylish charms! These small details can make a big difference, allowing you to express your personality and switch up your style with ease. Whether you want to add a pop of color or a touch of sparkle, our charms are the perfect way to customize your look and make your everyday bag feel brand new.

At Stradivarius, we believe that your accessories should reflect your personality. That's why we offer a wide range of bags and backpacks for women to choose from. Whether you're looking for a classic black bag or a more trendy style, we've got you covered.

subcategories.name: Sale
subcategories.description:
Step into the season in style with Stradivarius' summer sales!

Fashion Sales on Your Must-Haves!
Dresses and co-ords are your go-to for instant elegance and easy styling. This season at Stradivarius, think breezy fabrics and playful cuts. Think ruffles, cut-outs, and backless designs.
No summer wardrobe is complete without a selection of cute tops. Cropped styles, tie-fronts, and off-the-shoulder designs are reigning in 2025. Pair them with high-waisted denim shorts or flowy skirts.
And let’s talk swimwear. Whether you’re more into minimalist one-pieces or bold bikinis with cut-outs and ruching, the summer sales at Stradivarius are full of options.

Footwear & Accessories on Sale
Sandals are the star of summer. Think strappy gladiators, minimalist slides, and sporty flatforms. Also, oversized tote bags, layered necklaces, and bucket hats are trending hard.

subcategories.name: STR TEEN subhome
subcategories.description:
Because every moment deserves to be lived in your own style.
The STR Teen collection by Stradivarius was created for a new generation that’s not afraid to be authentic. A collection that understands the importance of comfort, self-expression, and individuality. Each piece is designed to accompany you in your everyday life — at school, out with friends, or simply being yourself.

Versatile styles for every version of you
 From relaxed basics to trend-forward looks, the STR Teen collection brings together pieces that adapt to your rhythm. Soft fabrics, playful prints, and colours full of energy come together in garments that feel as good as they look. Because when you feel good, you shine differently.

A collection inspired by real moments
Whether you’re looking for the perfect outfit for a weekend plan, layering pieces for changing seasons, or just something that reflects how you feel today — STR Teen has something for you. Our designs are made to be worn your way, again and again.

Start creating your own style story
The STR Teen collection is now available online and in selected Stradivarius stores. Discover the latest arrivals and find the looks that speak to you.
